description: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
flavorText: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...
name: Fizz

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Mark of the Storm</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
levelupDescription: You've summoned the same ally 5+ times this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned the same ally 5+ times this game.
flavorText: Kennen had heard it too, the roar of some unseen... something. Man or monster, it did not matter. The Kinkou would protect their land at any cost.
name: Kennen

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."
name: Teemo

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Supercool Starchart</style></link> in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Supercool Starchart in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
levelupDescription: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names.
flavorText: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."
name: Zoe

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: The first time I <link=vocab.AttackStrike><style=Vocab>attack strike</style></link>, swap me with the ally to my right, then <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Attack: The first time I attack strike, swap me with the ally to my right, then Recall it.
flavorText: She searched for herself in other peoples' secrets. Saw herself through the eyes of so many. As she approached the forest, she wondered if it would be just another lens--or if, just this once, she'd found a mirror.
name: Ahri

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Warlord's Palace</style></link> or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> it 1 round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Strike: Summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 1 round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Warlord's Palace has finished its Countdown.
flavorText: "The Sentinels' code seems full of complicated restrictions. Things like 'Never take a life in the name of vengeance' and 'Fight for the world, never for yourself'. As for me..."
name: Akshan

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me Challenger this round.
flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.
name: Diana

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Spiderling.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round Start: You have 3+ other Spiders.
flavorText: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.
name: Elise

levelupDescription: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.
flavorText: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."
name: Lucian

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create 4 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Bombs</style></link> in your deck, then <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you destroy 2 allied Time Bombs.
flavorText: Over many years, Zilean established a network of promising young mages from different times, all of whom were capable of seeing out his life's work should the unthinkable happen. Although a kind and encouraging mentor, deep sorrow creased his brow when he sought solitude, and there was a weariness in his eyes that only someone who has lived multiple lifetimes could hope to comprehend.
name: Zilean

description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
flavorText: "With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker
name: Aphelios

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 10 cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 10 cards in the enemy deck.
levelupDescription: 5 of your traps have been activated.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: 5 of your traps have been activated.
flavorText: Caitlyn was always a dogged and thorough investigator, a quality that helped propel her fast through the ranks of Piltover enforcement. But when a case concerning a certain 'C' came along, one that countless other enforcers had abandoned, it seemed almost as though Caitlyn had finally met her match. Almost.
name: Caitlyn

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axe</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Strike: Create a Spinning Axe in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck with 2+ total Spinning Axes.
flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."
name: Draven

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mystic Shot</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
flavorText: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"
name: Ezreal

flavorText: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."
name: Fiora

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flawless Duet</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavorText: "Once we studied art and beauty, and our hearts soared. But when they broke our walls and spilled our blood, we fell back down to earth..."
name: Irelia

flavorText: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.
name: Kalista

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> once. When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck once. When I level up, Recall me.
flavorText: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."
name: Katarina

flavorText: "Now now, no need to squabble amongst ourselves. For the moment, we will refrain from any rash action. Let us reconvene once we've heard from our emissary. After all..."
name: LeBlanc

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
levelupDescription: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Watcher</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+. When I level up, create a Watcher in hand.
flavorText: "The Watchers lurk just beyond these walls, suspended in ice, frozen in time... and while they wait, I have plans that must be set in motion..."
name: Lissandra

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
flavorText: "Don't you worry, Pix! We're gonna get outta the Glade, and we're gonna adoribus ALL THE THINGS! Are you ready?!"
name: Lulu

description: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."
name: Miss Fortune

description: When you cast a spell, grant +1|+0 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> other ally that isn't <link=keyword.Immobile><sprite name=Immobile><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Immobile</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant +1|+0 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
levelupDescription: You've gained 8+ spell mana this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've gained 8+ spell mana this game.
flavorText:
"Have you said your goodbyes, young Tidecaller?"
"Yes, greatmother."
"Are you afraid?"
"...Yes, greatmother."
"Good. To be afraid is to be cautious. But trust yourself, as we trust you. Now, go. And may the currents keep you."
name: Nami

description:
When I <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link> or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant Lurker allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Place me into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.
Round End: Place me into your deck.
flavorText: "Young Jhuraa was exploring, as is his way, and in a small hidden cave, discovered some ancient texts! We took them to a translator in Marrowmark, and the scrolls... they speak of an ancient terror who stalked our ancestors. A queen. A xer'sai queen!" - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder
name: Rek'Sai

description: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
levelupDescription: I see <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blade of the Exile</style></link> in your hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see Blade of the Exile in your hand.
flavorText: "I will not run from what I was. I made a promise to mend what I have broken..."
name: Riven

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
descriptionRaw: Support: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
flavorText: "Healing is, by its very essence, selfless. You need not draw the power from them; they give it willingly. Show them compassion, and you will see how they shine."
name: Soraka

description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: "Okay, Plan A: We blast our way in and start shooting. If that doesn't work, we go to Plan B: Blast our way out and keep shooting. Then, we'll regroup and go to Plan C, which is basically Plan A again..."
name: Tristana

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats.
levelupDescription: I've seen myself or my shadows <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the enemy Nexus twice<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen myself or my shadows strike the enemy Nexus twice.
flavorText: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."
name: Zed

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescription: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.
flavorText:
"It's IMPORTANT we make a good impression. The new safety inspector is stopping by, and you know what that means!"
"No more explosions?"
"WHAT?! No! It means explode things where he can't see 'em! 'No more explosions'... are you crazy?!" - Ziggs and Otto
name: Ziggs

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
levelupDescription: You <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 4+ enemies<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crystal Arrow</style></link> on top of deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You Frostbite 4+ enemies. When I level up, create a Crystal Arrow on top of deck.
flavorText: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."
name: Ashe

description: The first time I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
flavorText:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"
name: Braum

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Trick</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Fleeting Time Trick in hand.
levelupDescription: You've <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> 4+ times<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create 3 <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Chronobreaks</style></link> in your deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've Predicted 4+ times. When I level up, create 3 Chronobreaks in your deck.
flavorText: It's not about how much time you have, it's about how you spend it.
name: Ekko

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> or <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
levelupDescription: You've cast two 6+ cost spells. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Acceleration Gate</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've cast two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
name: Jayce

levelupDescription: I see your hand is empty.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see your hand is empty.
flavorText:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"
name: Jinx

description:
The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit each round, I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
descriptionRaw:
The first time you slay a unit each round, I mark the weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
levelupDescription: I've seen you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> 2 units with my mark<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you slay 2 units with my mark.
flavorText:
Once there was a lonely man
Who split himself in twain
From one came two, born anew
Never alone again.
name: Kindred

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.
name: Leona

description: Each round, the first time you summon another ally, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you summon another ally, Toss 2 and summon a Sapling.
levelupDescription: Your units have died or your cards have been <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> 25 times.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Your units have died or your cards have been Tossed 25 times.
flavorText: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.
name: Maokai

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavorText:
"It appears that, once enough souls have been shaken, it breaches our world. Only hope can send the monstrosity back to its realm... but hope died here long ago, on a queen's final breath, and with a king's eternal scream."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Nocturne

levelupDescription: You've targeted allies in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've targeted allies in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: Here stands Atreus, who had his freedoms stripped from him by the very Aspects he revered. Here stands the embers of War, who left Atreus with gifts few mortals can comprehend. Here stands a man, ready to fight and die for those he cherishes.
name: Pantheon

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
flavorText: Humility is a mark of heroism, but many historians would agree that Poppy is kind of pushing it.
name: Poppy

description: When I <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Death From Below</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I Lurk, transform me into Death From Below.
flavorText:
"...the visions are back again. I see his desperate eyes looking up at me whilst the jaull-fish closed its maw around him. We tried pulling, but the ship was too small, and the beast too big. I had no choice. I had to cut his line. I had to."
- Blood-soaked letter
name: Pyke

description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
flavorText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard up to 3 cards to grant allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Rumbles</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> for the first, <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> for the second, and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> for the third.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard up to 3 cards to grant allied Rumbles everywhere Impact for the first, Quick Attack for the second, and SpellShield for the third.
flavorText:
"Annnnd that oughta do 'er."
"ERROR."
"WHAT? I just fixed that!"
"SYSTEM FAILURE IMMINENT."
"Turn it off. TURN IT OFF!"
- Rumble and Tristy
name: Rumble

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen allies gain Barrier 4+ times.
flavorText: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."
name: Shen

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give me +1|+1 this round.
levelupDescription: I've seen Dragon allies deal 12+ damage<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen Dragon allies deal 12+ damage.
flavorText:
"On the one hand, she is, by her very nature, our most hated foe, her kind having historically brought only anguish to Demacia. On the other, she is trusted by the Prince, and seems to have all the makings of a determined soldier and valuable ally. I only hope that she does not betray the trust we have placed in her."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall
name: Shyvana

flavorText: Sivir made her way through life as a mercenary, and burdened herself with all the risks and rewards that came with her choice. One fateful expedition almost cost her everything, but as her blood seeped into Shurima's sands, it awoke an ancient power that would return both her and her homeland to greatness.
name: Sivir

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a An Acquired Taste in hand.
levelupDescription: I've <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> 3+ units<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> my <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> enemies and release my allies.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've Captured 3+ units. When I level up, Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
flavorText: "My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."
name: Tahm Kench

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give me and my supported ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
descriptionRaw: Support: Give me and my supported ally Tough this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
levelupDescription: I've seen you target or <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>support</style></link> allies 7+ times<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you target or support allies 7+ times.
flavorText: "Taric's gentle kindness inspires all who meet him, galvanizing them to find the warmth within to bolster themselves on even the coldest of nights." - Mountain Scryer
name: Taric

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Play a Destiny Card.
descriptionRaw: Play: Play a Destiny Card.
flavorText: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."
name: Twisted Fate

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
flavorText:
"This world will fear me. It will wear my scars for all eternity. It will ache under the weight of my power. It will shudder under the shadow of my enormity!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 1 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Veigar

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
flavorText: "Zaun, you have seen your share of tragedies, and the time has come for change. And, as with all great advancements, it must start within you."
name: Viktor

description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 1 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 1 to the weakest enemy.
levelupDescription: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.
flavorText:
"The two were once friends, but time and affinity made them into brothers. Certainly Azir could not have achieved all that he was able without Xerath by his side." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Xerath

description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
descriptionRaw: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
flavorText: "Death is like the wind..."
name: Yasuo

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand
name: Gangplank

flavorText: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.
name: Garen

description: When you cast a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
levelupDescription: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.
flavorText: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"
name: Heimerdinger

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
flavorText: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."
name: Karma

description:
When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you cast another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When you cast a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you cast another, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."
name: Lee Sin

levelupDescription: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells. When I level up, create a Final Spark in hand.
flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"
name: Lux

description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon Valor.
flavorText: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight
name: Quinn

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast.
levelupDescription: I've seen you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you slay 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die.
flavorText: "To be a Sentinel is to fight. To lose yourself or to lose the ones you love. But more than that? It means to live. For yourself... and for the ones you love."
name: Senna

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."
name: Swain

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
flavorText:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima
name: Taliyah

flavorText:
"Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."
name: Thresh

description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Pillar</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play Ice Pillar.
flavorText:
One by one, torches lit along the pass, throwing the scene into sharp relief. There were dozens of trolls, maybe hundreds, each one hulking, massive, and deadly.
"I'll ask one more time," Trundle snarled, hefting Boneshiver over one shoulder. "Are you gonna give up, or am I gonna have to break your skulls?"
name: Trundle

description: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card (max +8|+0). <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card (max +8|+0).
flavorText: "Enforcer Vi, please! Think of the people! The collateral damage! The PAPERWORK FOR INJURY CLAIMS!" - Insightful Investigator
name: Vi

description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mist</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time an ally dies, summon an Encroaching Mist.
levelupDescription: I've seen allies with 20+ total power die.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen allies with 20+ total power die.
flavorText: "There is something that deeply unsettles me about the young king. Something at his heart... a hunger that cannot be satisfied, a desire that goes unfulfilled." - From the record of Nunyo Necrit of Camavor
name: Viego

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...
name: Vladimir

description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
flavorText: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."
name: Anivia

levelupDescription: I see the enemy Nexus has 10 or less Health.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see the enemy Nexus has 10 or less Health.
flavorText: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain
name: Darius

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
flavorText: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.
name: Hecarim

description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
levelupDescription: Allies have survived 3+ <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> from enemy blockers<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Allies have survived 3+ strikes from enemy blockers.
flavorText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.
name: Jarvan IV

description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
flavorText: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.
name: Sejuani

levelupDescription: You've summoned 10+ mana of landmarks<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, if you have the attack token, create an <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Unstoppable Force</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 10+ mana of landmarks. When I level up, if you have the attack token, create an Unstoppable Force in hand.
flavorText:
"And here's da last stop on da Chip tour of Targon! It's PAPA! He's da BIGGEST of da Targon giants, an' sings a mean song, too, lemme tell ya. Just don't try to climb him! Da spikes tickle him, and you dun want him sneezin' when you're halfway up no sah!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 6
name: Malphite

levelupDescription: When you are <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, copy <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When you are Deep.  When I level up, copy Tossed allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
flavorText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note
name: Nautilus

description:
When I'm discarded, grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and place me into your deck.
I have +1|+0 for each card you've discarded this game (Max +7|+0).
descriptionRaw:
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
I have +1|+0 for each card you've discarded this game (Max +7|+0).
flavorText: Sion glimpsed fleeting flashes of opaque memories. Legions standing before him. Accolades. Crowns. War. A king's deathrattle. The Great Nothing. Blood. But just as soon as they floated by, they floated past, pale ribbons in the wind.
name: Sion

levelupDescription: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
levelupDescriptionRaw: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
flavorText: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."
name: Tryndamere

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your allies have 20+ total Power<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round End: Your allies have 20+ total Power.
flavorText: "I don't care what you write about me, you middling creature! Just make sure I'm described as handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very intelligent. Can you spell that?"
name: Aurelion Sol

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
flavorText: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite foreman
name: Caustic Cask

description: Pick a follower. Create an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower. Create an Ephemeral copy of it in hand.
flavorText: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.
name: Fading Memories

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Predict.
flavorText: "The fin brings fear, but the teeth bring death." - Shuriman saying
name: Feral Prescience

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
flavorText: Most of the spirits on the Shadow Isles are utterly terrifying and morbid creatures. A small handful are... well... just really, really annoying.
name: Pesky Specter

description:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Daring Poros</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 Daring Poros in hand.
flavorText: Two downy shapes arced gracefully over the adoring crowd, leaving a cloud of fluff and the faint scent of baked goods in their wake.
name: Poro Cannon

description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
descriptionRaw: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
flavorText: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger
name: Production Surge

description: To play me, kill an ally.
descriptionRaw: To play me, kill an ally.
flavorText: You are what you eat.
name: Ravenous Butcher

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
flavorText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus
name: Rite of Calling

description: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>. If it's already <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>, the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy Vulnerable. If it's already Vulnerable, the strongest ally starts a free attack Challenging it.
flavorText: "You've got a name, and I've got a list." - Pyke
name: The List

description:
To play, spend all your mana.
<style=Variable>Deal that much to a unit.</style>
descriptionRaw:
To play, spend all your mana.
Deal that much to a unit.
flavorText: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite experimenter
name: Thermogenic Beam

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer
name: Warning Shot

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 4 from an ally.
descriptionRaw: Drain 4 from an ally.
flavorText: "What kills you only makes me stronger." - Thresh
name: Absorb Soul

description: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
flavorText: "Ah yes! The Adaptatron 3000! Adaptable, inventive, AND quite the looker! If the fellow could speak, I'm sure we'd have MUCH to share with each other." - Heimerdinger
name: Adaptatron 3000

description: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 10 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 10 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "On my signal." - Caitlyn
name: Advanced Intel

flavorText: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius
name: Affectionate Poro

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Clockling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Predict.
Countdown 2: Summon a Clockling.
flavorText: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.
name: Ancient Preparations

flavorText: "Alright! New arm! Always wanted one of those. What've we got next? Gravwheels for legs? Electrobelts? METAL TEETH? Actually, leave my face. I like my face."
name: Armed Gearhead

description: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: Imagination is the spark of great invention. Yet, it is research that makes the spark a conflagration.
name: Astute Academic

description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Baccai Reaper

description: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.
name: Barkbeast

description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1.
flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle
name: Battlefield Prowess

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Reforge.
flavorText: "Like the huntresses said--a hundred days and nights. A hundred blisters on these feet, a hundred bugs in my breakfast, a hundred 'blade'-this and 'vengeance' that. And well more than a hundred brow-beatings from those three, I'll tell you..."
name: Blade Squire

description: Deal 1 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything.
flavorText: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina
name: Blade's Edge

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Snapjaw Swarm</style></link> on top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Create a Snapjaw Swarm on top of your deck.
flavorText: "If it were up ta me, I'd have a jaull-fish take me afore them bloody things. Sooner go fast than be left screamin' fer me mates to stick me while I'm eaten alive." - Jagged Butcher
name: Bloodbait

flavorText: The Sandthrashers do everything with their companions. Fight, hunt, kill... and eat.
name: Bloodthirsty Marauder

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy with 3 or less Health.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite an enemy with 3 or less Health.
flavorText: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum
name: Brittle Steel

description: The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time you slay a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: What must the Mist see when it looks upon Maeve? Exuberance, confidence--irrepressible optimism. How it must long to snuff that taunting flame. For what can death fear, but life?
name: Burgeoning Sentinel

description:
Start of Game: Summon 1 of me from your deck if it's all Shuriman.
<link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 25</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=vocab.SunDiscRestore><style=Vocab>Restore the Sun Disc</style></link>.
When an Ascended ally levels up, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 10 rounds.
descriptionRaw:
Start of Game: Summon 1 of me from your deck if it's all Shuriman.
Countdown 25: Restore the Sun Disc.
When an Ascended ally levels up, advance me 10 rounds.
flavorText: When Azir beheld the Shuriman capital's Sun Disc, he saw it not for what it was, but what it could be--the key to returning Shurima to its former glory.
name: Buried Sun Disc

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Tough.
flavorText: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.
name: Chain Vest

description: Once you've summoned a landmark this game, grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Once you've summoned a landmark this game, grant me +2|+2.
flavorText:
"Okay so hello I'm Chip an' I'm here to show you Targon! It's wowow big an' tall so I hope you got good shoes for da walkin'! Let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 1
name: Chip

flavorText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."
name: Cithria of Cloudfield

description: Give an ally +2|+0 and "<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Recall me" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 and "Round End: Recall me" this round.
flavorText: "Return to breath, and find your strength!" - Gust Monk
name: Cloud Stance

description: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
flavorText: "We're playing by MY rules." - Ekko
name: Concurrent Timelines

description: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Ruinous Acolyte</style></link> or an <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Obelisk of Power</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Ruinous Acolyte or an Obelisk of Power in hand.
flavorText: "I will fashion Shurima in MY image." - Xerath
name: Construct of Desolation

description: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
flavorText: Imitation is the sincerest form of thievery.
name: Counterfeit Copies

description: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."
name: Crackshot Corsair

description: If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.
name: Crawling Sensation

description: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "They're rarely kept as pets, you know. Just one little scratch from those claws of theirs can open up a vein... but I don't mind." - Clara, Crimson Disciple
name: Crimson Bloodletter

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 2 to me.
flavorText: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus
name: Crusty Codger

description: When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm Recalled, draw 1.
flavorText: "Water is flexible, adaptive - it will take the form most needed in the moment, flowing forth or retreating from the shore." - Ionian monk
name: Dancing Droplet

flavorText: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.
name: Daring Poro

description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Death Ray - Mk 1

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Exalted Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
flavorText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.
name: Destined Poro

description: When you play a Dragon, it <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> me and you draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When you play a Dragon, it strikes me and you draw 1.
flavorText: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer
name: Dragon Chow

description: When I'm summoned, move <link=card.dravenRef><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, move Draven to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"
name: Draven's Biggest Fan

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavorText: It takes a special sort to make complete garbage of perfectly seaworthy gear. But if there's one thing they're good at, it's that. Just that.
name: Dreg Dredgers

description: If you see me in a <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, summon me.
descriptionRaw: If you see me in a Prediction, summon me.
flavorText: "Ahh, Shomi's a GENIUS with that hoverboard. I once saw them switch a sumpgrinder into a bottomboard backslide, then catch air with a three-point triple dip! Or something. Look, the point is, they're awesome, okay?" - Practical Perfectionist
name: Dropboarder

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Sand Soldier.
flavorText: "As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."
name: Dunekeeper

description: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper
name: Elixir of Iron

description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
flavorText:
"When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist."
- Noxian axiom
name: Elixir of Wrath

description: Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy -2|-0 and Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: Desert-dwellers know how to avoid the sun's searing and relentless heat, but those unprepared to withstand it will find their strength and energy sapped at remarkable speed.
name: Exhaust

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Hexite Crystal</style></link> in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Hexite Crystal in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "BUT MY PLAAAANNN--MEEEOOOOOW!"
name: Fallen Feline

description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
flavorText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.
name: Fleetfeather Tracker

description: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: Everyone wants a familiar, but no one's prepared for the responsibility. You've gotta take them on walkies, make sure they're eating a balanced diet... house-train them. It's a lot of work.
name: Flower Child

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: "Takes two things to get an idea off the page and into your hands. Funding's one half of the equation, the other's a good forge. And it's not just the tools or the hardware in the forge; if your chief doesn't have what it takes to run things, well, your idea's staying on paper." - Jayce
name: Forge Chief

description: When I'm supported, give me and my supporting ally +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm supported, give me and my supporting ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"Don't be afraid of the howling gale
As it blows 'cross the mountain and through the dale
Never you worry, you have nothing to fear
My darling, rest, mother is near." - Targonian lullaby
name: Frightened Ibex

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 8</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frostguard Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 8: Summon a Frostguard Thrall.
flavorText: Certainly, there were enough half-witted warriors within the ranks of Trundle's disorderly army to use as front-line fodder, but Lissandra desired something much more loyal, something that served her, and her alone...
name: Frozen Thrall

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Elusive this round.
flavorText: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed
name: Ghost

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."
name: Gift Giver

description: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
descriptionRaw: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
flavorText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune
name: Gifts From Beyond

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit and create 2 copies of me in your deck. Once you've cast me <style=Variable>3</style> times, transform all copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Pack Your Bags</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Drain 1 from a unit and create 2 copies of me in your deck. Once you've cast me 3 times, transform all copies of me everywhere into Pack Your Bags.
flavorText:
"We go hard, 'til we get it, get it
We go hard, we so in it, in it
We Pop Stars (Pop Stars), only winning, winning now
Ain't nobody bringing us down, down, down, down"
- Evelynn, 'POP/STARS'
name: Go Hard

description: When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When an ally gets Barrier, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."
name: Greenglade Caretaker

description: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have 4+ allies, deal 2 instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have 4+ allies, deal 2 instead.
flavorText: "Okay, this one's for the newsletter. And remember to smile this time! One... two... three...!" - Tristana
name: Group Shot

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc
name: Guile

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"
name: Hapless Aristocrat

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavorText: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.
name: Health Potion

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
Nightfall: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
flavorText: So goes the cycle of night and day, one always following the other.
name: Heavens Aligned

description: When I’m summoned or destroyed, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned or destroyed, Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "What do you mean, 'this doesn't look safe'?" - Ziggs
name: Hexplosive Minefield

description: Create a random landmark with <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown</style></link> in hand, or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your landmarks 1 round.
descriptionRaw: Create a random landmark with Countdown in hand, or advance your landmarks 1 round.
flavorText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean
name: Imagined Possibilities

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
flavorText: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”
name: Inspiring Mentor

description: When I’m summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrappy Bomb</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, summon a Scrappy Bomb.
flavorText: Giselle was one of Professor Heimerdinger's best students until she heard of Ziggs' strange experiments down in Zaun. Then it was all "hexplosives" this and "could you recommend me for an internship" that.
name: Inventive Chemist

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.
name: Jagged Butcher

description: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Jailbreak

description: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 4.
descriptionRaw: Toss 4.
flavorText: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer
name: Jettison

description: When cast or discarded, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttler</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When cast or discarded, summon a Scrap Scuttler.
flavorText: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.
name: Jury-Rig

flavorText: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.
name: Legion Rearguard

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Swain
name: Legion Saboteur

description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
flavorText: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder
name: Lonely Poro

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Duskpetal Dust</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Duskpetal Dust in hand.
flavorText: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."
name: Lunari Duskbringer

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
flavorText:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook
name: Mageseeker Conservator

description: Grant an ally +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavorText: Power, but at what cost?
name: Mark of the Isles

description: Create 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>The Messengers</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Create 5 The Messengers in your deck.
flavorText: "Time passes, skies turn--the Serpent moves aside and the Messenger takes its place overhead. A season of abundance awaits..." - Lunari Priestess
name: Messenger's Sigil

description: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...
name: Mushroom Cloud

description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
flavorText: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"
name: Navori Bladescout

flavorText: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand
name: Nimble Poro

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link> or when I'm summoned or destroyed: Grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm summoned or destroyed: Grant the strongest ally +2|+0.
flavorText: Sparking, crackling pillars rose from the sands, subverted places of power that would reinforce Xerath's already powerful army.
name: Obelisk of Power

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally in hand Ephemeral and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: Oh, the poor lad...
name: Oblivious Islander

description: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen
name: Omen Hawk

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prank</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Prank in hand.
flavorText:
"Curious and playful, the otterpus are an immensely cheery bunch. Or is it otterpi? Say, didn't I pack a third sandwich?" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 7
name: Otterpus

description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
name: Parrrley

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an Elite, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tattered Banner</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.
name: Penitent Squire

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"Pix is AWESOME, he's small and cool and wholesome,
His favorite things are possums, and he likes to... hrmhmhmhrmthrossom!" - Lulu
name: Pix!

flavorText: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant
name: Plucky Poro

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me 2 random keywords.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me 2 random keywords.
flavorText: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank
name: Plunder Poro

description: Deal 1 to anything and plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Haha! Bullseye!" - Teemo
name: Poison Dart

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next Round Start and give it Fleeting.
flavorText: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler
name: Pool Shark

flavorText: In space, no one can hear you squee.
name: Porofly

flavorText: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.
name: Precious Pet

flavorText: The poros of yesteryear had much thicker heads than their contemporary kin, making them a little bit dumber, and a whole lot headbuttier.
name: Proto Poro

flavorText: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."
name: Prowling Cutthroat

description: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
flavorText:
"I used to be like you–couldn't even lift a puffcap. But then, I found "Shake: by Purpleberry." It's got all the right stuff a yordle needs to go from zero to hero. So when you've had a hard workout, fuel up with 'Shake,' and become the buffest of bros, like me!" 
- Printed Advertisement
name: Purpleberry Shake

description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian
name: Radiant Strike

description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give all allies Tough this round.
flavorText: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden
name: Ranger's Resolve

description: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
name: Ravenous Flock

description:
To play, discard 1.
When I'm discarded, summon an exact copy of me.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
When I'm discarded, summon an exact copy of me.
flavorText:
"We have an irregularity in our midst. Though most of those we revive abhor their return to life, this fellow seems to both understand his lot, and revels in the subsequent opportunities. Curious."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Reborn Grenadier

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally.
flavorText: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.
name: Recall

description: When allies attack, before <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link> tries to activate, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>obliterate</style></link> the top card of your deck if it doesn't have <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, before Lurk tries to activate, obliterate the top card of your deck if it doesn't have Lurk.
flavorText: Bilgewater's more treacherous coves soon became home to all manner of sea beasts. There they lie, waiting for the next foolhardy crew to ignore the harbormaster's warnings.
name: Ripper's Bay

description: Give an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.
name: Rush

flavorText: Tor felt his life fading with every heartbeat, but in that grave and looming darkness, where he was expected to embrace dread, he instead found purpose. He would not only face death willingly, but would bring with him the very demon who had dared to cut his life short. This is how he would be remembered. This would be Tor's saga.
name: Saga Seeker

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Sapling at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "Wheeeeeeee!" - Sapling
name: Sapling Toss

description:
To play, discard 1.
<link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Manifest a Mecha-Yordle.
flavorText: "Junk. Crap. Garbage... Hey, now THIS is what I'm freakin' talkin' about!" - Rumble
name: Scrapheap

description:
<link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw:
Predict.
Give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "I have seen my destiny, and this time, I will not be stopped." - Azir
name: Scrying Sands

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has Ephemeral.
flavorText: "You are smoke—a whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi
name: Shadow Apprentice

flavorText: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed
name: Shadow Fiend

description: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies Vulnerable.
