flavorText: "You gonna tell me where you got those 'extra kegs', Slim? Huh? Otherwise, we could play a lil' tug-of-war between your tongue and Jimbo's arm. And buddy... I ain't bettin' on you." - Wise Fry
name: Shakedown

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
flavorText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah
name: Shaped Stone

flavorText: "Might not look much, aye, but they're eager for blood. And if you let 'em at you, they'll know where to find it when they're bigger. Best wear yer gloves." - Jaull Hunters
name: Sharkling

flavorText: "MY GRATEST STRENF IS PREBABLE MY COMAND OF DA COMON PEEPUL AN ALSO APPARENLY MY SPELING IS RELLY GUD TO" - Note scribbled in sand
name: Shellshocker

description: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and SpellShield this round.
flavorText: "Soon as you step outside the Tooth, you'll feel 'em. Fingertips on your nape, light as rain. Them creatures don't budge when you come at 'em, neither. Ain't afraid of my blade or my torch. Nothin'. Awful things." - Whale's Tooth looter
name: Shroud of Darkness

flavorText: I mean, there are worse ways to die.
name: Sinister Poro

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.
name: Solari Soldier

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."
name: Spacey Sketcher

description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"
name: Sparring Student

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> an enemy spell played this game.
descriptionRaw: Manifest an enemy spell played this game.
flavorText: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe
name: Spell Thief

description: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "Ever since I first saw one streak across the night sky, I've loved stellacorns. If only I'd known then that I'd meet so many!"
name: Star Shepherd

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a copy of me in the enemy deck with 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> attached.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in the enemy deck with 2 Poison Puffcaps attached.
flavorText: The stink of a whump in the height of puffcap season is unlike any other. Imagine an open sewer full of week-old fish and rotten eggs, and you're halfway there.
name: Stinky Whump

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a landmark you can afford.
descriptionRaw: Manifest a landmark you can afford.
flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
name: Stoneweaving

description: Remove <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Remove Fleeting from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 Fleeting.
flavorText: "It's simple stuff, really. I replaced the steel frame with a more durable alloy I invented, and rerouted the circuitry away from the hinges to stop the systems from shorting out. Easy peasy." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
name: Stress Testing

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Fearsome this round.
flavorText: As the sun melts into pitch, the terrors of this place wake, watch, and wait.
name: Stygian Onlooker

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, gift me confidence,
Fill me with The Flight's conviction,
Set me on my path."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Flight

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Recall me.
flavorText: If one is to venerate the hunt, one must pause to weep for the hunted.
name: The Mourned

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Play me as <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>First Wave</style></link> or <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Last Wind</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Play me as First Wave or Last Wind.
flavorText: The Kinkou speak of only two gods: the first wave, who cradles life in its warm waters, and the last wind, who snatches life with its final, frigid sighs.
name: The Wings and The Wave

description: When an enemy blocks me, give me +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When an enemy blocks me, give me +3|+0 this round.
flavorText: Surprised by the resilience of the creature they'd found on the shore of Ionia, the young general insisted on taking it back home, eager to find out its true strength.
name: Thrashing Snapper

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Flash Freeze</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Fury of the North</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Entomb</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Flash Freeze, Fury of the North, or Entomb in hand.
flavorText: The Freljordian sisters Avarosa, Serylda, and Lissandra bore tremendous power, though chose to wield it in different ways - each one distinctly merciful, martial, or malicious.
name: Three Sisters

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Waking Sands</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Waking Sands in hand.
flavorText: "Okay, Davu. You're gonna go in there, grab that... whatever it is, and you're going to make us rich. Me rich. You're going to make me rich. Got it? Also, if that's a trapped thing, I am real sorry in advance."
name: Treasure Seeker

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> an <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Otterpus</style></link> or one of 2 spells from your regions that cost 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Manifest an Otterpus or one of 2 spells from your regions that cost 3 or less.
flavorText: "Unhand my sandwich this instant!" - Conchologist
name: Trinket Trade

description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Scarmother Vrynna
name: Unscarred Reaver

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand another random <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> follower that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand another random Last Breath follower that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…
name: Warden's Prey

flavorText: Once a caravan has been disabled, the hunters will occasionally retreat and allow their hatchlings to forage forward. It is here that the young xer'sai refine their instincts, learning which sounds are of the desert, and which signal their prey.
name: Xer'sai Hatchling

description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
flavorText: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand
name: Ye Been Warned

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yetis</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create 2 Enraged Yetis in your deck.
flavorText: "It was so tiny and peaceful! Hard to believe it would grow up to be... well... a yeti." - Avarosan Trapper
name: Yeti Yearling

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Tiny Spear</style></link> or a <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Tiny Shield</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create a Tiny Spear or a Tiny Shield in hand.
flavorText: "My spear used to belong to a great hero, too... I made Poppy hold it for a minute!"
name: Yordle Squire

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
flavorText:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"
name: Zaunite Urchin

flavorText: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.
name: Academy Prodigy

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, give it <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, give it Elusive this round.
flavorText: "We'll surround the location while using smokespinners to mask our movements..." - Caitlyn
name: Ambush

description:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
descriptionRaw:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
Enlightened: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
flavorText: The Freljord's unrelenting cold and punishing storms kill most who enter its barren lands. But those who survive find within themselves an inner strength that spurs them onward through the rest of their lives.
name: Ancestral Boon

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Stasis Statue</style></link> in place with the ally stored inside.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an ally to summon a Stasis Statue in place with the ally stored inside.
flavorText:
"Oh, Tai! Come here! We could use your help with something."
- Xetsa, Void Researcher
name: Ancient Hourglass

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
If you have a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link>, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy.
If you have a Darius, Rally.
flavorText: "I'll handle this myself." - Darius
name: Apprehend

flavorText: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.
name: Arachnoid Horror

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.
name: Arena Battlecaster

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
flavorText: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."
name: Arena Bookie

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict.
flavorText: Throughout his time as a student of chronomancy, Tai had to reconcile his uncertainty with his determination. It was better to have hope in a potential victory than to dwell on what could possibly go wrong.
name: Aspiring Chronomancer

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Draw 1.
flavorText: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."
name: Avarosan Sentry

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ignition</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Ignition in hand.
flavorText:
Subject requested that we keep only his mind intact, stating "That's where I've stored all my grudges."
- Augmentor's log, entry 1011
name: Ballistic Bot

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Hungry Owlcat</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
flavorText: "Gunnin' in the streets and tuckin' kiddos into sheets!"
name: Bandle Commando

description: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: Wars are won in the forge.
name: Battlesmith

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Invoke.
flavorText: The heavens hang over you, a tapestry of black lit with twinkling stars. You are small and dim against its vastness. Where will you turn your gaze first?
name: Behold the Infinite

description:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
Plunder: Nab 1.
flavorText: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"
name: Black Market Merchant

description: <link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally that <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> this round. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Reputation: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the strongest ally that struck this round.
flavorText: "A secret is only worth the cost of keeping it."
name: Black Rose Spy

description: Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon Valor.
flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
name: Blinding Assault

description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.
name: Blood for Blood

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crest of Insight</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Crest of Insight.
flavorText:
"Okay EV-ER-EE-ONE say "HI BLU!" HI BLU! Okay one time I thought he was like "HI BLU!" back, but now dat I think about it might have been my voice bouncin' off da walls. OH WELL he's all magical and stuff and also blue so if you ask me he doesn't even NEED to speak! OKAY BYE BLUE LET'S GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 5
name: Blue Sentinel

description: When I'm summoned, create a random landmark that costs 2 or less in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random landmark that costs 2 or less in hand.
flavorText: The Fussyfoot Bomberator-X did precisely what it was meant to do: sow chaos. Plus, it was easy to parallel park.
name: Bomber Twins

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
flavorText: "Little parting gift..." - Pyke
name: Bone Skewer

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flame Chompers!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Flame Chompers! in hand.
flavorText: Jinx had a more conventional supplier once, but the two of them had a small falling out. By which we mean, the supplier fell out of a window. By which we mean, the supplier was blown out of a window. By Jinx.
name: Boom Baboon

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."
name: Boomcrew Rookie

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 3 to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 3 to me.
flavorText: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry
name: Boxtopus

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III
name: Brightsteel Protector

description: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
flavorText: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran
name: Brothers' Bond

description: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Armed Gearhead</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Ballistic Bot</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Nyandroid</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Armed Gearhead, Ballistic Bot, or Nyandroid in hand.
flavorText: "Rationality and choice separate humanity from its base animal instincts." - Viktor
name: Calculated Creations

description:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
descriptionRaw:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
flavorText:
"May the sun shine, and may the xer'sai sleep."
- Merchant's prayer
name: Call the Pack

description:
Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Parallel Convergence</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
flavorText: "Splitting the timelines..." - Ekko
name: Called Shot

description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani
name: Caught in the Cold

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "Tell me a secret." - Ahri
name: Charm

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
flavorText: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.
name: Chempunk Pickpocket

description: When you summon another <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chirean Sumpworker</style></link>, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> me and transform allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chirean Sumpworkers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Sumpworks Posses</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another Chirean Sumpworker, Obliterate me and transform allied Chirean Sumpworkers everywhere into Sumpworks Posses.
flavorText: The first Zaunite miners to discover the chirean thought them timid, simple creatures. But as the years passed, and as they grew comfortable with humans, they slowly revealed their close societal bonds, and their seemingly native understanding of technology.
name: Chirean Sumpworker

description: Summon me from hand the first time you've played 2 spells each round.
descriptionRaw: Summon me from hand the first time you've played 2 spells each round.
flavorText: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Claws of the Dragon

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> an allied landmark 2 rounds.
descriptionRaw: Play: Advance an allied landmark 2 rounds.
flavorText: The constructs that guard Zilean's tower are able to withstand the harsh desert for millennia, and not just for their clever construction.
name: Clockwork Curator

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Cloud</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Mushroom Cloud in hand.
flavorText: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Clump of Whumps

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
flavorText:
"Today is indeed a red letter day! An exploration into the deep! I expect things to proceed quite... swimmingly! Ho ho!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 1
name: Conchologist

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Challenger.
flavorText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana
name: Confront

description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavorText: Most shallows teem with all kinds of marine life, but none compare to the reefs of the Azure Way. The Way is a magical, otherworldly place, full of wonder.
name: Coral Creatures

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: I strike an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
flavorText: At first, the Demacian soldiers thought they heard dozens of claws skittering across the square's tile. It wasn't until it breached the watchtower that they realized those many limbs belonged to a single creature.
name: Crawling Viperwyrm

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +2|+0.
flavorText: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."
name: Crimson Aristocrat

description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"
name: Crimson Disciple

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Escaped Abomination</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon an Escaped Abomination.
flavorText: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.
name: Cursed Keeper

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
flavorText: "Yes, I'm quite sure the fellow up on the roof has many stories to tell. We all know he has lots to say. We just don't have any idea exactly WHAT it is he's saying." - Stilted Robemaker
name: Darkbulb Acolyte

description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina
name: Death Lotus

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, grant me Challenger.
flavorText: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."
name: Dragonguard Lieutenant

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
flavorText: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."
name: Dreadway Deckhand

description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
flavorText: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.
name: Eager Apprentice

description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flow</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
flavorText: "Heed the tide's temper..." - Nami
name: Ebb

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon in hand.
flavorText:
Dragon Egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco Murmurationis) 
Location: Recovered by researcher Anden Mayne on Expedition. 
Notes: Gestation period unknown. Incubation continued. Recent movement observed within shell. Egg responds to heat, light, hammer. Current studies inconclusive. 
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Egghead Researcher

description: To play, discard 1. Deal 2 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Deal 2 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Let's give 'em a show!" - Rumble
name: Electro Harpoon

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.
name: Emperor's Dais

description: Pick 1 of 3 units or spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on all copies of it.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 units or spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
name: Entrapment

description: Draw a champion.
descriptionRaw: Draw a champion.
flavorText: "Reavers approach! Sound the call and light the fires, we'll need all the help we can muster!" - Avarosan Sentry
name: Entreat

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavorText: "It was just a pair of eyes at first, and a lone voice chittering in the shadows. More every time I looked back. Angrier. Louder. Soon as I saw the Tooth, I ran." - Whale's Tooth looter
name: Evershade Stalker

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link> if you cast 2+ spells last round<style=Variable></style>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Summon a Dragonling if you cast 2+ spells last round.
flavorText:
"A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us."
- Teachings of the Dragon
name: Eye of the Dragon

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
flavorText:
"Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Rule of ice, break the sky.
Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Bring us strength, them demise."
- Troll chant
name: Faces of the Old Ones

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Prey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
flavorText: Who could forget their own god of death, other than those cursed with immortality? And what greater fear can a god of death have, other than being forgotten?
name: Fading Icon

description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you Stun or Recall a unit, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"
name: Fae Bladetwirler

description: When I'm discarded, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Risen Rider</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, create a Risen Rider in hand.
flavorText:
"It was only after rubbing the rider's armor with Blackshade leaves that they were spared from the basilisk's viciousness. The plants are native to the hinterlands, just as the beasts, and are as pungent as they are poisonous."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Fallen Rider

description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
descriptionRaw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavorText: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia
name: Feral Mystic

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
flavorText:
"About the only good part of Ferros financing my work was getting to team up with Reggie. Not only is the man one of the most competent people I've ever worked with, he's a heck of a guy, too."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal
name: Ferros Financier

description: The next time you play a unit this round, grant it <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>. It's now an Elite.
descriptionRaw: The next time you play a unit this round, grant it Scout. It's now an Elite.
flavorText: When Demacians' mettle is tested, they rise to the occasion.
name: Field Promotion

description: The first time you discard a card or damage the enemy Nexus, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time you discard a card or damage the enemy Nexus, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: "Alright, good fight. Good show everyone. Now clean up this crap, and uh, you know the drill: anything salvageable... fix it up, put it in the shop, and we'll just sell it right back to 'em! AHAHAHA!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Fix-Em-Uppers

description: When I'm discarded, summon me.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, summon me.
flavorText: "GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" - Jinx
name: Flame Chompers!

description: Grant an ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +2|+0 and Impact.
flavorText: "If they ain't howlin', it ain't hot enough! Heh heh." - Rumble
name: Flamespitter

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
flavorText: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard
name: Fortune Croaker

description: Kill an ally to draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavorText: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator
name: Glimpse Beyond

flavorText: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.
name: Golden Narwhal

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to draw a unit.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to draw a unit.
flavorText: Dr. Esslanger was once a respected and retiring physician who garnered his credible reputation through years of hard work. But it wasn't until a young noblewoman was brought to his study, her blood blackened by betrayal, that he truly began serving Noxus.
name: Grave Physician

description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavorText:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"
name: Greenglade Duo

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in your hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in your hand by 1.
flavorText: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."
name: Greenglade Lookout

flavorText:
"Though quite small, the grumbleslug has a large appetite and possesses what I can only describe as a 'real attitude problem.'" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 17
name: Grumbleslug

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
flavorText: Stellacorns shine brightest when they are happy.
name: Guiding Touch

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Cloud Stance</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Cloud Stance in hand.
flavorText: "It is from control of breath that our school's technique is derived. Just as it is from wind that a tempest is born."
name: Gust Monk

description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Unleashed Spirits</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 3 Unleashed Spirits.
flavorText: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.
name: Haunted Relic

description: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
flavorText: The clouds twisted around their massive forms, and the sky itself seemed to shake with their keening wails. She knew what was to come, and yet felt not fear but the warm embrace of destiny.
name: Herald of Dragons

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Lifesteal this round.
flavorText:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem
name: Herald of Spring

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Hibernating Rockbear

description: When I'm summoned, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant the strongest enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."
name: Hired Gun

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.
name: Honored Lord

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise
name: House Spider

description: Your opponent discards the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> follower from hand.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent discards the weakest follower from hand.
flavorText: "The frail have no place in this world. Each day brings them new torment, another turn of the vise. I do not deal in death, I deal in mercy." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Hunt the Weak

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Frostbite an enemy.
flavorText: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.
name: Icevale Archer

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."
name: Imperial Demolitionist

description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma
name: Insight of Ages

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Elusive this round.
flavorText: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.
name: Intrepid Mariner

description: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
flavorText: "Self-improvement is a game where you are the hero and the villain. You will struggle. You may even think you've won. But in the end, you will always be left standing in your own way." - Mechanized Mimic
name: Iterative Improvement

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant 1 cost allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant 1 cost allies everywhere +1|+0.
flavorText: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.
name: Jagged Taskmaster

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."
name: Keeper of Masks

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prank</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Prank in hand.
flavorText:
"Dear me, I've just had the oddest dream. One moment, I'm scrambling through the kelp, looking for my shell hat, when suddenly I hear the most wonderful melody. Next thing I know, I'm seated here, pen in hand, writing these words. I don't recall sitting down for a nap..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 22
name: Kelp Maidens

description:
Grant <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Grant Barrier to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
flavorText: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen
name: Ki Guardian

description: Give the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give the weakest ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
flavorText: "Shine once more, before the end." - Lamb
name: Lamb's Respite

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flawless Duet</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavorText: "Our performance will be... unforgettable." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Lead and Follow

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.
name: Legion Drummer

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.
name: Legion Grenadier

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Knock 'Em Down</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Powder Keg.
Create a Knock 'Em Down in hand.
flavorText: "Done as you asked, Cap'n. Give 'er a little spark and she'll kick back alright." - Dreadway Deckhand
name: Line 'Em Up

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Celestial that costs 3 or less, Epic, or multi-region follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a Celestial that costs 3 or less, Epic, or multi-region follower.
flavorText: The strangest part wasn't that the telescope got up, stretched, and started walking around, but that it insisted on dressing for the weather, so it had to find a suitably comfortable scarf.
name: Loping Telescope

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant me Elusive.
flavorText: "Let us cast our eyes toward the heavens, toward the sun, toward our lady's li-- Wait... What...? What is that...?" - Solari Priest
name: Lunari Shadestalker

description: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +1|+1 and Challenger once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"
name: Mageseeker Persuader

description: Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune
name: Make it Rain

description: When I'm summoned, if you've cast a spell this round, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've cast a spell this round, grant me Elusive.
flavorText:
"The ocean believes that the wave will return,
gives trust to the ebb, to the flow, to the churn.
So 'ere the wave crashes against the shore, 
the ocean delights in the crest's bold roar."
- A verse from 'Serenade for the Tidecaller'
name: Marai Songstress

description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText: The Marai rarely desire to venture far from home. But Ai'la was born with curiosity in her heart--and though she is bound by duty to her tribe, she spends each waking moment dreaming of the day she can truly be free.
name: Marai Warden

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
flavorText: They say the Mask Mother created Kindred, just as she created all the incarnations of death. But from whom did she receive her mask, if she didn't craft it herself?
name: Mask Mother

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand at <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in hand at Round End.
flavorText:
"A true supervillain can never have enough minions! Short little fellows who know their place, obey your every word, and always come back for further instruction."
- Excerpt from Ch. 2 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Minion

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allied <link=card.mist><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraiths</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths everywhere +1|+0.
flavorText: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.
name: Mistwraith

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Summon another at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Powder Monkey.
Plunder: Summon another at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "Aw... d'ye think they're cute? WELL, THEY'RE NOT. They get into everything, they're messier than a seasick courier, an' THEY WON'T BLOODY SHUT UP. NO MONKEYS ON THE SHIP. THAT'S THE END OF IT." - Petty Officer
name: Monkey Business

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Powder Kegs.
flavorText: "Barrel!" - Gangplank
name: More Powder!

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: The goats of Mount Targon are even more dangerous than their ordinary cousins, for the gems that make up their horns embed painful shards upon impact.
name: Mountain Goat

description: Deal 2 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to anything.
flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal
name: Mystic Shot

description: To play me, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: To play me, Recall an ally.
flavorText: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."
name: Navori Conspirator

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Navori Brigand</style></link> with my stats.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand with my stats.
flavorText: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”
name: Navori Highwayman

description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> or <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Stop a Fast or Slow spell that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "Don't do that, you silly smufflefloof! You might hurt the antylopes!" - Lulu
name: Nopeify!

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Spectral Riders.
flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.
name: Onslaught of Shadows

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
name: Pale Cascade

description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
descriptionRaw: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
flavorText: It's not quite as cuddly as the real thing, but it IS just as cute.
name: Patched Porobot

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "Sure, I've had good days and bad days, just like anyone. In this line of work, the bad days can get real bad, and the good days can get real rich." - Sivir
name: Payday

description: Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next Round Start. Give them Fleeting.
flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
name: Pick a Card

description: Deal 1 to anything. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything. Draw 1.
flavorText: The first rule of experimentation: poke it, and see what happens.
name: Pokey Stick

description: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Poro.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you Behold a Poro.
flavorText: A herd needs just two things: love, and company. Anything else is just fluff.
name: Poro Herder

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Countdown 2: Draw 1.
flavorText: Zilean shows those he brings to the tower what, precisely, they are looking to restore. The Preservationist is able to show them, if only a glimpse at a time.
name: Preservarium

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: "What's that, boy? Two of the recruits were scouting in the woods and stumbled across a scary grass monster, and now they might die a long and painful death? Lead the way!" - Teemo
name: Puffcap Pup

description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
descriptionRaw: Silence a follower.
flavorText:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook
name: Purify

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: "We are quick! We are the wind!" - Kennen
name: Quicken

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: When a hammersnout breaks a ship's keel, it seems to do it for sheer entertainment. They rarely devour the crew they stranded, instead leaving a feast for the creatures that follow.
name: Redfin Hammersnout

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Return</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to create a Fleeting Return in hand.
flavorText: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...
name: Retreat

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "What a shame, boys! All that power and just no rhythm to match it? We can't ALL be stars, I guess...!"
name: Ribbon Dancer

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
flavorText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Rock Hopper

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Obliterate the weakest enemy.
flavorText:
"Okay so EV-ER-EE-BODY watch out here cuz dis is a BIG DROP an' I've fallen down here a few times and LEMME TELL YOU it's a long way down! An' I'm made of wok so I just bounce, but dat's not true for you guys... so be caref--ooh dere's Cliff! Let's go say hi!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 3
name: Rockfall Path

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Destroy an allied landmark to grant allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Ruinous Acolytes</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Destroy an allied landmark to grant allied Ruinous Acolytes everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: All of Xerath's acolytes gave something of themselves in exchange for power, but his most powerful devotees were hardly more than husks of their former selves, serving as both conduit and power source for their new emperor's energy.
name: Ruinous Acolyte

description:
Draw 1.
If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> a unit this round, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
If you've slain a unit this round, drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Sandthrashers primarily recruit from their enemy's ranks. Whoever survives their initial assault is invited to join, or die.
name: Ruinous Path

description: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
flavorText: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx
name: Rummage

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
flavorText: "Most weapons are crude tools, no better than the hands that wield them. But a weapon infused with runic magic is so much more than mere steel."
name: Runeweaver

description: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton
name: Ruthless Predator

flavorText: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.
name: Ruthless Raider

description:
To play, discard a card.
Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Reborn Grenadier</style></link> and give it +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard a card.
Summon a Reborn Grenadier and give it +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Rise again, my child..." - Dr. Esslanger, Pensive Physician
name: Salt And Stitches

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttlers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Scrap Scuttlers.
flavorText: Two gentle creatures, once separated by an impassable lane of land, were finally brought together in the tepid waters of the Sump.
name: Scrapdash Assembly

description:
When another ally dies, or <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, or Last Breath: Toss 1.
flavorText: "Alright, you lot--haul them traps up! An' remember: if you see one of 'em sea scarabs, you cut rope an' move on. I ain't riskin' the keel for whatever they've half-eaten, y'hear?" - Bilgewater captain
name: Sea Scarab

description:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw 1 of them.
descriptionRaw:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
Plunder: Draw 1 of them.
flavorText: "Share and share alike." - Ruthless Raider
name: Shared Spoils

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: The next time an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally attacks, revive me attacking.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: The next time an Ephemeral ally attacks, revive me attacking.
flavorText: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon
name: Shark Chariot

description: Give an ally +2|+2 and "I can block units with <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+2 and "I can block units with Elusive" this round.
flavorText: Any who would dare breach Demacia's walls will find a full company awaiting them--forewarned and heavily armed.
name: Sharpsight

description: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, Frostbite it.
flavorText: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen
name: Shatter

description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
flavorText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.
name: Shield Vault

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavorText: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."
name: Silent Shadowseer

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora
name: Single Combat

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: I start a free attack.
descriptionRaw: Play: I start a free attack.
flavorText:
"Drip, drop, drip, drop, the blood splashes down,
Swim, swim, comes the swarm, better now to drown,
Snip, snap, go the teeth, and we all scream,
To the deep, off we sleep, for forever dreams!"
- Bilgewater nursery rhyme
name: Snapjaw Swarm

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +0|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +0|+4 this round.
flavorText:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.
name: Solari Shieldbearer

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: The Solari believe that it was Targon's sunhawks--brilliant as they are--who caught the Immortal Fire's attention, and who subsequently inspired her cycle of death and rebirth.
name: Solari Sunhawk

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>, <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Lifesteal, Fearsome, and Ephemeral.
flavorText: "Come, child. See as I see, and feel as I feel. Do not fear the darkness." - The Rekindler
name: Song of the Isles

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Resonating Strike</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
flavorText: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin
name: Sonic Wave

description: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks SpellShield.
flavorText: "Ah, you did not expect to see water in the middle of the desert. Worry not. Come, drink your fill, wash your feet. Rest in the shade awhile. This is Azir's new Shurima, and it is an oasis."
name: Soothsayer

description: When you summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: Only the fallen knew that she did not walk alone. Only they could see the countless companions she led down the path to lands beyond.
name: Soul Shepherd

description: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
flavorText: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma
name: Sown Seeds

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle.
flavorText: Small stature, BIG personality.
name: Squeaker

description: When I'm summoned, the enemy summons a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Snow Hare</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, the enemy summons a Snow Hare.
flavorText:
"You cannot make a wolf from a hare."
- Winter's Claw proverb
name: Stalking Wolf

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round End: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game.
flavorText:
"Up to the sacred falling flow,
Deep into pools, the healing springs
Shining light, water all aglow,
Listen to how the river sings,
High on the crystal mountain."
- Ottrani verse
name: Star Spring

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> <link=card.behold><style=AssociatedCard>The Messenger</style></link>, grant Celestial allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold The Messenger, grant Celestial allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText:
"May the Messenger play,
And with his joy,
Light the stars."
- Lunari Prayer
name: Starbone

description: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."
name: Starlit Seer

description: I cost 2 less if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial.
descriptionRaw: I cost 2 less if you Behold a Celestial.
flavorText: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."
name: Starry Scamp

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
flavorText: Those who set off to climb Mount Targon are soon rewarded with some of Runeterra's most glorious views. And as the climb steepens, so do its rewards.
name: Startipped Peak

flavorText: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe
name: Startled Stomper

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an attacking enemy.
flavorText: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo
name: Steel Tempest

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 10 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 10 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: Zayne Asako, like all Zaunite kids, had to grow up fast on those violent and dark understreets. After losing his brother to yet another senseless gang crime, he committed himself to Piltover enforcement, hoping reason and law would make his home finally safe.
name: Sting Officer

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and Ephemeral.
flavorText: Some look at the Ruination and only see the destruction and misery. Others see the glass half full.
name: Stirred Spirits

flavorText: Yordles haven't quite figured out gravity yet, but then, gravity hasn't quite figured out Bandle City, either.
name: Stone Stackers

description: ALL spells cost 1 more.
descriptionRaw: ALL spells cost 1 more.
flavorText: What begins as a shapeless, rough-hewn block of petricite quickly becomes something more under the clever hands of its sculptor. That is when a piece truly starts to come to life.
name: Stony Suppressor

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavorText: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger
name: Sumpworks Map

description: Grant an ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+2.
flavorText: "Our shield is our conviction, our resolve, our trust in the light!" - Solari Shieldbearer
name: Sunblessed Vigor

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "And these three EXTRA sparkly stars I call... 'The Celestial Jump Rope'! Or is it more of an upside down happy face?" - Zoe
name: Supercool Starchart

description: Swap 2 allies.
descriptionRaw: Swap 2 allies.
flavorText: "To dance is to move in harmony with the motions of all things." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Syncopation

description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round. If you have leveled a champion this game, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>The Absolver's Return</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 this round. If you have leveled a champion this game, create a The Absolver's Return in hand.
flavorText: "Everyone told me not to use this. 'No one must wield such a powerful weapon,' they said." - Akshan
name: The Absolver

description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you Behold a Nightfall card.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, allow me to remember,
That though I stand in solitude,
Your children dance above,
And I am not alone."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Sky Shadows

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Toss 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
flavorText: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal
name: Thorny Toad

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>, then draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Predict, then draw 1.
flavorText: "The future's what I make it..." - Ekko
name: Time Trick

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link> and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> an allied landmark 2 rounds.
descriptionRaw: Predict and advance an allied landmark 2 rounds.
flavorText: "If only you saw time as I do, you would know it is not immutable." - Zilean
name: Time in a Bottle

description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, then deal 1 to another.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, then deal 1 to another.
flavorText: "Look out!" - Ekko
name: Timewinder

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 and a random keyword.
I keep these stat buffs and keywords when I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 and a random keyword.
I keep these stat buffs and keywords when I'm Recalled.
flavorText: The Tornado maintains her calm with breathing exercises... and by channeling her inner turmoil into a vicious hurricane of deadly blades.
name: Tornado Warrior

description: Create in hand a random 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Create in hand a random 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 0 this round.
flavorText: "And thus," Officer Harknor announced, "the trail leads us to..."
name: Trail of Evidence

description: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
name: Transfusion

description: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
flavorText:
"Note to self: On next expedition, keep all valuables in my FRONT pockets." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 19
name: Tricksy Tentacles

flavorText: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.
name: Trifarian Gloryseeker

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
flavorText: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran
name: Trifarian Hopeful

description: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: Troll chants are highly varied. They differ from group to group, and are often incomprehensible. They are all, however, terrifying to witness.
name: Troll Chant

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Regeneration. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
flavorText: Pity those who see the promise of victory in a troll's blood.
name: Troll Gifts

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText:
The scout knelt by a tattered edge of cloth hidden in the snow, where the scent of human sweat and fire smoke lingered in the cold air.
He pulled the material free and saw at one end, a talisman dangled, dull under the stormy sky. Avarosan.
name: Troll Scavenger

description: Give an ally +3|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
flavorText: "Never fear change. It will question you, test your limits. It is our greatest teacher." - Karma
name: Twin Disciplines

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
flavorText: Darkness comes in all shapes and sizes. Some of them SURPRISINGLY adorable.
name: Twisted Catalyzer

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
flavorText: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.
name: Tyari the Traveler

description:
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from anything.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Drain 1 from anything.
Nightfall: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
flavorText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Unspeakable Horror

description:
Draw 1.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Activate an ally's <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Nightfall: Activate an ally's Nightfall effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
flavorText: "Come, child. No need to be afraid." - Mask Mother
name: Unto Dusk

description:
Give an enemy follower <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy follower -4|-0 this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
flavorText: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen
name: Unworthy

flavorText: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."
name: Vanguard Defender
