flavorText: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.
name: Vanguard Lookout

description: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
flavorText: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.
name: Veteran Investigator

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat
name: Vile Feast

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Sandstone Charger.
flavorText: "The box might be worth something, but whatever's inside sure as sand isn't. By which I mean, it's not worth opening. Speaking from experience, here." - Sivir
name: Waking Sands

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.
name: War Chefs

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Weapon Hilt

description: When you summon another Yordle, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another Yordle, grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: "Priceless is the glory of exploration, but the greatest discoveries are always... ahem... profitable."
name: Yordle Explorer

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies with equal or less Power than me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give all allies with equal or less Power than me Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "Poppy never listens t'me, so you better: It's not about the hammer, it's about the yordle who swings it."
name: Yordle Smith

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> and +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack and +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: Sir Ribery Montague left home hoping to complete some great quest or curry favor with a notable house. But fate led him to a hidden bandlewood, where young Bri quickly transformed Sir Ribery into a frog, and yanked him off on HER adventures. Poor Rib!
name: Young Witch

description: If your opponent has more units than you, grant an ally +1|+1 for each extra unit they have.
descriptionRaw: If your opponent has more units than you, grant an ally +1|+1 for each extra unit they have.
flavorText: These brave few knew they were stepping into warfare with beings of unimaginable power. They knew death was likely. But still, they stepped.
name: Against the Odds

flavorText: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan engineer
name: Amateur Aeronaut

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat
name: Arachnoid Sentry

flavorText: "There's a sucker born every minute, and I'm gonna take 'em for all they got... this mech arena's gonna be a GOLD MINE."
name: Arena Kingpin

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
flavorText: "The order is given." - Azir
name: Arise!

description: When you cast a spell, grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "Any simpleton can build a machine, but it takes extraordinary acumen to infuse a mechanized mind with TRUE progress! Soon enough those damned bureaucrats will come crawling back..." - Klas Henwick
name: Assembly Bot

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an enemy.
flavorText: In the Freljord you can hunt, or you can starve.
name: Avarosan Marksman

description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create an Enraged Yeti in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."
name: Avarosan Trapper

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Hungry Owlcat</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
flavorText:
"This is a song
About Poppy the strong!
Poppy the mightiest, frightiest... sprong!" 
- Scratched-out lyrics from the 'Songbook of Reginaldactyl and Faltimisquee, Bards Extraordinaire'
name: Babbling Balladeers

description:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a multi-region follower.
descriptionRaw:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
Play: Manifest a multi-region follower.
flavorText: It's unclear whether Bandle City ever really elected a mayor, but an enormous mustache would almost certainly be a prerequisite.
name: Bandle City Mayor

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to create a multi-region follower in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to create a multi-region follower in hand.
flavorText: "Painting's not about copying what you see, it's about expressing how YOU see the world. And right now, I'm seeing that you moved again. Hold still please!"
name: Bandle Painter

description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
descriptionRaw: An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
name: Bayou Brunch

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle and grant it <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle and grant it SpellShield.
flavorText: "Turn it down, will ya?! I care barely hear myself counting all this money!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Bilgerat Rascal

description: If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista
name: Black Spear

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Saplings</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to summon 2 Saplings.
flavorText: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"
name: Blighted Caretaker

description:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Then summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link> equal to the amount of damage dealt.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Then summon Powder Kegs equal to the amount of damage dealt.
flavorText: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor
name: Boomship

description: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Bouncing Bomb

flavorText: Lively currents of magic weave through Serpent Isles' reefs, nourishing the sea's extraordinary inhabitants.
name: Bubble Bear

description: The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time you slay a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: The Buhru and Sentinel philosophy align on a single crucial point: all things must end, and some must be made to end.
name: Buhru Sentinel

description: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
flavorText: "...an' then a BIIIIG HUUUGE ELNUK came FLYIN' out of the trees with a teeny lil' poro on his back an' there was a FRIENDLY YETI as well because he wanted to play with his friends an' they all ran down the mountain goin' RAAAAAWRRRR an' then..." - Ingvar the Younger
name: Call the Wild

description: When I'm summoned, summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mist</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon an Encroaching Mist.
flavorText: The soldiers of Camavor marched with Viego in life, then again in death, their loyalty unwavering.
name: Camavoran Soldier

description:
To Play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
<link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
To Play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
Predict, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
flavorText: "The actions we take today plant seeds for future trees." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer
name: Careful Preparation

description: An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Cataclysm

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "Stoic guardian, the gentle touch of the full moon restores your strength. Awaken and safeguard us from those who would trespass upon this sacred place." - Crescent Guardian's inscription
name: Crescent Guardian

description: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in your hand.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in your hand.
flavorText: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"
name: Crimson Curator

description: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.
name: Culling Strike

flavorText: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.
name: Darkwater Scourge

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"
name: Dawnspeakers

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavorText: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal
name: Deadbloom Wanderer

description: Remove <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Remove Ephemeral from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
flavorText: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed
name: Death Mark

description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain
name: Death's Hand

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
flavorText: "I have sworn myself to Azir, and to Shurima, my home! Will you not do the same?"
name: Devoted Council

description: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.
name: Divergent Paths

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: With each passing night, the travelers grew more weary. Their slumber was restless, and their dreams vivid. Sleep no longer gave respite, and instead pulled the life from their bones.
name: Doombeast

description: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
flavorText:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Double Trouble

description: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: "Their cry sounds like a raspy cat. If you ever hear it, you're to turn tail, and find the nearest guard. You hear? Because where there's dragon eggs, there's dragons." - Targonian forager
name: Dragon's Clutch

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme
name: Ember Maiden

description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
descriptionRaw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavorText: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."
name: Emerald Awakener

description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give all allies Challenger this round.
flavorText: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora
name: En Garde

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sarcophagus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Sarcophagus.
flavorText: As richly appointed as the tomb was, it did little good for the banished and the dead.
name: Endless Devout

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Buried Sun Disc</style></link> 3 rounds.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, advance your Buried Sun Disc 3 rounds.
flavorText: "Oh! That's Padjuman, one of the elders of Nashramae! I think everyone has come to our city today, papa!" - Excited onlooker
name: Esteemed Hierophant

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite an enemy.
flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.
name: Flash Freeze

description:
Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw:
Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
flavorText: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.
name: Flash of Brilliance

flavorText: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
name: Fledgling Stellacorn

description: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavorText: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise
name: Frenzied Skitterer

description:
If 3+ allies have died this round, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vilemaw</style></link>.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: If 3+ allies have died this round, summon Vilemaw.
flavorText: "Kneel before your fanged god. Better yet, die before it." - Elise
name: Fresh Offerings

description:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
flavorText: The purple faefolk are sweet little creatures, and cared for by all those who encounter them. Well, almost all.
name: Fuzzy Caretaker

description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx
name: Get Excited!

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavorText: "...and then a sparklefly is like stardust that falls down to the ground and then flies back up and they're amazing and I saw one last night that was so pretty and I'm hungry and it flew up all the way to the STARS and then..."
name: Giddy Sparkleologist

description: Kill an ally with <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally with Last Breath to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavorText: "SUPPAH TIIIIME!" - Ravenous Butcher
name: Gluttony

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon an <nobr><link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it.</nobr>
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon another <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> <nobr>copy of it.</nobr>
descriptionRaw:
Play: Recall an ally to summon an Ephemeral copy of it.
Countdown 3: Summon another Ephemeral copy of it.
flavorText: Once, the God-Willow grew within Omikayalan. What springs forth from that place now may be stronger, may be weaker. What matters is that it is new.
name: God-Willow Seedling

flavorText: KILL. CRUSH. DESTROY. REPEAT.
name: Golden Crushbot

description: An ally you've targeted this round <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An ally you've targeted this round strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "They never expect the grappling hook!" - Akshan
name: Grappling Hook

flavorText: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."
name: Greenfang Warden

description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
flavorText: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.
name: Greenglade Elder

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: ALL players draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: ALL players draw 1.
flavorText: "Let them say what they will about my methods. They cannot deny progress--the light of my knowledge is shining like a beacon through the darkness of ignorance!" - Viktor
name: Hexcore Foundry

description: Grant Tech allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant Tech allies everywhere +1|+1 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: The Hextech Handler was initially constructed to transport raw materials through Piltover, but as time went on, the locals apparently developed a soft spot for him. Jayce's forge crew nicknamed him Nugget, a Piltovan lord reportedly donated a hat, and passing kids now adorn him with whatever they have to hand.
name: Hextech Handler

description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a unit this round.
descriptionRaw: Silence a unit this round.
flavorText: "They will know serenity." - Soraka
name: Hush

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText: "I will bury the world in ice." - Lissandra
name: Ice Shard

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 0. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Finds</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 0. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
flavorText: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir
name: Inner Sanctum

description: ALL players draw 2.
descriptionRaw: ALL players draw 2.
flavorText: "This a popular case, you know. Just had a chap in here earlier looking at it. Enjoy!" - Station Archivist
name: Insider Knowledge

flavorText: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer
name: Iron Ballista

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally you have.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally you have.
flavorText: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.
name: Iron Harbinger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link> and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally Spellshield and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: Iula still remembers the burning grief that coursed through her after she learned of her husband's death. When Pantheon came to her, asking if she would help him destroy a creature that feasted on this very pain, her answer was swift.
name: Iula

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
flavorText: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.
name: Jaull Hunters

flavorText: "Sure, a few of 'em hunt us, like they hunt everything. But y'know, most landwalkers I meet are just looking to enjoy their time in the big blue, same as us. We're all just people."
name: Journeying Sandhopper

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've Predicted this game.
flavorText:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"
name: Khahiri the Student

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavorText: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"
name: Kindly Tavernkeeper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally Challenger this round.
flavorText: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign
name: Laurent Duelist

flavorText: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper
name: Laurent Protege

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant allied Legion Marauders <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant allied Legion Marauders everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.
name: Legion Marauder

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to deal 2 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to deal 2 to anything.
flavorText: "First the crack, then the boom!" - Kennen
name: Lightning Rush

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me.
flavorText: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker
name: Lounging Lizard

flavorText: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.
name: Loyal Badgerbear

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Invoke.
flavorText: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening
name: Lunari Priestess

description:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
descriptionRaw:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies everywhere by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
flavorText: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.
name: Lure of the Depths

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Detain</style></link> in hand once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Create a Detain in hand once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."
name: Mageseeker Investigator

description: Pick an ally being targeted by enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> with only 1 target. Stop them.
descriptionRaw: Pick an ally being targeted by enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills with only 1 target. Stop them.
flavorText: An arrow knows neither the intent of the hunter, nor the worth of its prey.
name: Memory's Cloak

description:
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 3 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
Last Breath: Create 3 Gems in hand.
flavorText:
"Did you catch anything he said in there?"
"Not a word. Seemed nice, though."
- Emir and Haley, Mountain Sojourners
name: Mentor of the Stones

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "And... there. Tied up, nice 'n pretty. Renekton likes his meals delivered still-squirming."
name: Merciless Hunter

description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius
name: Might

flavorText: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder
name: Mighty Poro

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Imitation is flattery, and flattery can be quite deadly.
name: Mimic

description: Revive a random ally that died this round.
descriptionRaw: Revive a random ally that died this round.
flavorText: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator
name: Mist's Call

description: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
flavorText: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen
name: Mobilize

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sanctuary</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Sanctuary in hand.
flavorText: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.
name: Monastery of Hirana

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and summon a Powder Monkey.
flavorText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune
name: Monkey Idol

description: Grant me +2|+1 once you've discarded 3+ cards this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+1 once you've discarded 3+ cards this game.
flavorText: "What could better instill loyalty in a would-be traitor than the sight of a butchered conspirator, brought back to fight under the Noxian banner? They will all serve, one way or another." - The Lady of Blood
name: Noble Rebel

description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain
name: Noxian Fervor

description: Kill a damaged unit to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Noxian Guillotine</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
flavorText: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.
name: Noxian Guillotine

flavorText: "I clawed my way through years of Piltovan academia only to have my technologies deemed 'too dangerous' and my very presence dismissed as 'too cute'! Meow to Zaun, where I know at least one great mind shares my ambitions..."
name: Nyandroid

description: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
flavorText: "KaBOOMey!" - Zoe
name: Paddle Star

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Support: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
flavorText: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.
name: Parade Electrorig

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
flavorText:
"Of course, death is present in Demacia. We see it take our loved ones and know that, someday, it will come for us. But on these isles... I can almost taste death. I feel it in my lungs as I breathe, I hear it whisper in my ear. It is not some abstract notion. It sits with me here. Now. And it will have us all."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Passage Unearned

description: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
flavorText: Warden Mir's sprinting technique was a running joke among the other enforcers. Warden Kepple didn't get it.
name: Patrol Wardens

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link> or a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a Powder Keg or a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
name: Petty Officer

description: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.
name: Phantom Prankster

description:
<link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1 more.
descriptionRaw:
Nab 1.
Plunder: Nab 1 more.
flavorText: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.
name: Pilfered Goods

description: Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 10 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 10 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Here's MY calling card." - Caitlyn
name: Piltover Peacemaker

description:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate
name: Pocket Aces

flavorText: "Nine hundred ninety-eight... nine hundred ninety-nine... one thousand! There we are, Bawky, you look impeccable as ever. Okay, now do mine!"
name: Pompous Cavalier

description: Grant Poro allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: "They gobble 'em up, then look at you, tongues out, happy as sheared 'nuks in the thaw askin' for more! You try sayin' no." - Avarosan treatmaker
name: Poro Snax

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
flavorText: "Kay's awesome. She's got that whole 'practice makes perfect' mentality, you know? And boyyy does she practice." - Shomi
name: Practical Perfectionist

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
name: Prismatic Barrier

description: When you cast a spell, plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"
name: Puffcap Peddler

description: Give an enemy <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy -4|-0 and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
flavorText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.
name: Quicksand

flavorText: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Swain
name: Reckless Trifarian

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
descriptionRaw: Strike: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
flavorText: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.
name: Rimefang Wolf

description: Give an ally +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +4|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal
name: Rising Spell Force

description: Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath
name: Rite of the Arcane

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Draw a spell.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Draw a spell.
flavorText: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."
name: Rivershaper

description: To play, discard 1. Kill the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
flavorText: "Ally, enemy... I don't care." - Sion
name: Roar of the Slayer

description: When an ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> kills a unit, grant it an additional +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When an ally with Fury kills a unit, grant it an additional +1|+1.
flavorText: The Mist warped Gregem's mind, forcing him to relive Wrenwall, over and over. Stoked by long-buried bitterness and rage, he turned against the comrades who once stood with him.
name: Ruined Dragonguard

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. If you pick a landmark, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. If you pick a landmark, grant me Elusive.
flavorText:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Sai Scout

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal all allies 3.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Heal all allies 3.
flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai
name: Sap Magic

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
name: Scaled Snapper

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Protection</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Dragon's Protection in hand.
flavorText: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Scales of the Dragon

description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText: "I sealed my oath to the Winter's Claw when Sejuani gave me my first scar. Every scar since has been earned in her service."
name: Scarthane Steffen

description: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Scorched Earth

description: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
flavorText: "Little did our author know that soon the Ruinatio--the Ruin--no, no, no, that's not right, the ink's spilled again! Little did our author--no, no, no!"
name: Scribe of Sorrows

description: The first time an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> dies, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."
name: Senna, Sentinel of Light

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavorText:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.
name: Shadow Assassin

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
name: Shadowshift

description: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire
name: Sharpened Resolve

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw a random non-champion card from the enemy hand.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Draw a random non-champion card from the enemy hand.
flavorText: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate
name: Sleight of Hand

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
flavorText: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.
name: Slotbot

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
flavorText: The Solari look to the stars for guidance as much as any other Targonian, for the star dearest to their faith is the sun.
name: Solari Priestess

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
flavorText: "I can feel the sun no longer. Even so, I wield its memory--and that is enough."
name: Solari Sentinel

description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all other allies.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Recall all other allies.
flavorText: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."
name: Solitary Monk

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and Fearsome if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Once there was a hapless young man who thought to court a spider, never once suspecting he would end up in her web..."
name: Soulspinner

flavorText: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess
name: Sparklefly

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Seed of Strength</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3: Create a Seed of Strength in hand.
flavorText:
"Here's da first stop on da tour! I call this da leg wobbler because WOWEE are dere a lot steps! Pretty cool view too, an' dat's one of the best things in Targon. Okay let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2
name: Spiral Stairs

description: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and 1|1.
descriptionRaw: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral and 1|1.
flavorText: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
name: Splinter Soul

description:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant +2|+4 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
Plunder: Grant +2|+4 instead.
flavorText: "You Avarosans only grow weak and plump in your fertile fields. So rest tonight, you pitiful weaklings, and while you dream of tomorrow's bounty, we will take it." - Scarmother Vrynna
name: Spoils of War

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Spring Gifts</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Spring Gifts in hand.
flavorText: "Mostly, I mind the springs, but a shepherd's responsibility is first and foremost to their flock. Priorities have been known to collide."
name: Spring Guardian

description:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact Ephemeral copy in hand.
flavorText: "Go... surround them..." - Nocturne
name: Stalking Shadows

description:
<link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
If you have a Celestial ally, replace your deck with 20 copies of <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Behold the Infinite</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Invoke.
If you have a Celestial ally, replace your deck with 20 copies of Behold the Infinite.
flavorText: "Look, Kulun! The stars have so many stories to tell! Which should we read tonight, hmm?" - Moondreamer
name: Starlit Epiphany

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick a spell in the top 5 cards of your deck and create an exact <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick a spell in the top 5 cards of your deck and create an exact Fleeting copy in hand.
flavorText: Detectives are nothing without leads. An archivist's job is to collect every scrap of intel and create new possibilities where none previously existed.
name: Station Archivist

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
flavorText: When knight and dragon separated, panting and wounded, the latter seemed reinvigorated. It smelled blood, and was eager for more.
name: Strafing Strike

description: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
descriptionRaw: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
flavorText: The Bawkatrice is a loyal, steadfast mount under normal circumstances. However, when put under too much stress they are known to react in... unusual ways.
name: Stress Defense

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
flavorText: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.
name: Succession

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
flavorText: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.
name: Sump Dredger

description: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, deal 3 to it instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, deal 3 to it instead.
flavorText: "Better let 'em air out a minute. Greenies can't take the smell. But lemme tells ya... once you're accustomed, nothin' like it!" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Sump Fumes

description: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
flavorText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum
name: Take Heart

description: If you have a Yeti, summon an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link>. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: If you have a Yeti, summon an Enraged Yeti. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
flavorText: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Tall Tales

flavorText: Energy: 104kJ (25 kcal), Carbohydrates: 5.88g, Sugars: 3.53g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Fat: 0.18g, Protein: 0.98g, Water: 92g...
name: Tasty Faefolk

description: When I am summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Forge Worker</style></link>. When you cast a 6+ cost spell, destroy me and refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw: When I am summoned, summon a Forge Worker. When you cast a 6+ cost spell, destroy me and refill your spell mana.
flavorText: If Piltover is a city driven by invention, then its forges are its engines.
name: The Forge Of Tomorrow

description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and Challenger this round.
flavorText: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.
name: The Grand Plaza

description: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and Tough.
flavorText: There are many places of honor among the Winter's Claw, but one of the greatest is The Scargrounds, where damaged war vessels that have returned from raids are repurposed as gathering halls for warriors and their kin. These ships embody the tribe that built them--resilient and adaptable.
name: The Scargrounds

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1. If you are <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Toss 1. If you are Deep, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster.
flavorText: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.
name: The Slaughter Docks

description: Once I've seen 3 <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> allies attack, destroy me to summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vilemaw</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Once I've seen 3 Fearsome allies attack, destroy me to summon Vilemaw.
flavorText:
Its altars may lie dormant, its paths may seem untrod,
But in the dark still skitters, the beast that fools forgot.
name: The Twisted Treeline

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Revive me at the next Round Start and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died.
flavorText: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...
name: The Undying

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.guile><style=AssociatedCard>Guile</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Guile in hand.
flavorText: "Aelana, my dearest friend and colleague! Have you seen Lord Duin about...?  Ah, what a shame. I was very much looking forward to catching up. I do hope he paced himself tonight. I would hate for anything to happen to the old boy..." - Lady Auvray, Black Rose Spy
name: Thorn of the Rose

description: When I’m summoned, if you’ve summoned a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Thunder Fist</style></link> this game, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Masa, Crashing Thunder</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, if you’ve summoned a Thunder Fist this game, transform me into Masa, Crashing Thunder.
flavorText: As Masa struck the training dummy, a flash of lightning erupted from the fist, splitting the wood in two and singeing the hair on his hands. He pulled on the rope, reeling in the bronze hand and reflecting on his training—he was finally ready. Suddenly, a monstrous roar echoed in the distance.
name: Thunder Fist

description: Deal 1 to two different randomly targeted enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crashing Wave</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to two different randomly targeted enemies and create a Crashing Wave in your deck.
flavorText: "Oceans spill forth!" - Nami
name: Tidal Wave

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Create an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mumblesprite</style></link> with my supported ally's stats.
descriptionRaw: Support: Create an attacking Mumblesprite with my supported ally's stats.
flavorText: You're supposed to follow your dreams, not manifest them through inadvertent muttered conjuration as you sleep-float through an ancient magical forest. I mean SHEESH.
name: Trevor Snoozebottom

description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round or destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 this round or destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
name: Unleashed Energy

description:
Summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon 2 Roiling Sands.
Draw 1.
flavorText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.
name: Unraveled Earth

description: When I'm summoned, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Caustic Casks</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Caustic Casks.
flavorText: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."
name: Used Cask Salesman

description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"
name: Vanguard Redeemer

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
flavorText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign
name: Vanguard Sergeant

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Vault Breaker</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi
name: Vault Breaker

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Warlord's Palace</style></link> or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> it 2 rounds.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 2 rounds.
flavorText: Seeing Akshan hanging underneath the fourth-floor window, Najah cursed under her breath. Pretty boy beat her to the mark. Again. Turning her dagger over in her hand, she pondered what to say to him. Maybe this time, he'd finally acknowledge her.
name: Vekauran Vagabond

description: When cast or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When cast or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
flavorText: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain
name: Vision

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "OKAY, LITTLE BUDDY, YOU JUST SIT STILL WHILE I FLIP THIS SWITCHAROO OVER HEEERE AND BOOM! HA! ELNUKS FOREVER! We're totally gonna need more grass. And room." - Practical Perfectionist
name: Volunteer Elnuk

description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When an allied landmark is destroyed, grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: The acolytes had been accomplished before they sought out Xerath. Now that they had studied what he had once studied himself, they were unstoppable.
name: Waste Walker

description: Give 2 allies +1|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give 2 allies +1|+2 this round.
flavorText: "It is in the bonds of kinship that we must find our strength." - Pantheon
name: We Stand Together

description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
descriptionRaw: A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
flavorText: "I have the best job." - Draven
name: Whirling Death

description: Fully heal damaged allies.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal damaged allies.
flavorText: "For life!" - Soraka
name: Wish

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: If there is no greater pain than the papercut, then there is no one who better understands pain than the librarian.
name: Wizened Wizard

description: When I’m summoned, give me +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, give me +1|+0 and Elusive this round.
flavorText: "They say you don't speak to save others from the weight of your knowledge. Hmm... I bet you just got tired of answering questions." - Ahri
name: Woodland Keeper

flavorText: "Targonians need no further proof of the gods' cruelty. Look at what they have done to us. Look at what they have done to our most cherished companions." - Pantheon
name: Wounded Whiteflame

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Get an extra mana gem this round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Get an extra mana gem this round.
flavorText: "These ancient cairns are reminders that we are but the latest in a long line of tribes to brave these untamed lands." - Ashe
name: Wyrding Stones

description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
flavorText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.
name: Xenotype Researchers

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict.
flavorText: Not all xer'sai are born to butcher. Some can summon their kin with piercing shrieks that rattle the sands as well as the senses.
name: Xer'sai Caller

description: When I’m summoned, if you’ve added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+2.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, if you’ve added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+2.
flavorText: "Giantus grassicus. These terrifying creatures camouflage themselves by laying like ordinary grass and attack any unfortunate enough to walk over them. If encountered, run away forever!" - Ava Achiever
name: Yordle Newbie

description:
Grant an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zenith Blade</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+2 and Overwhelm.
Daybreak: Draw a Zenith Blade.
flavorText: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest
name: Zenith Blade

description: When you cast a spell, give me +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Many of our tribe find Loto somewhat unnerving. They see only a tireless fighter, and the distance in his troubled gaze. But I know what's truly in his heart--fear that he is not strong enough to save us... and extraordinary love." - Tama, Marai Songstress
name: Abyssal Guard

description: Deal 3 to anything or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to anything or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: "This ray of light will guide our march to Piltover. Nothing will stand in the way of our Glorious Evolution!" - Viktor
name: Aftershock

description: When I’m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
flavorText: "Worst. Trip. Ever." - Elle
name: Aloof Travelers

description: To play me, kill 2 allies.
descriptionRaw: To play me, kill 2 allies.
flavorText:
"Put 'em in the cage, tum-te-dum... 
Pluck up every soul, one by one...
Never let ‘em go, no! No sir…
Else them spirits make quite a stir..."
name: Ancient Crocolith

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: "TICKETS! GET YER TICKETS! NOWWWW HALF OFF! Oh, biscuits, if I don't sell these tickets, the boss'll kill me... literally."
name: Arena Promoter

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: A handful of Targonian tribes speak of the Fox, a god of death seen as a lone star in the night sky. As the legend goes, the Fox descends upon the mountain with each death, and takes the soul to the skies to create his own dark constellation.
name: Astral Fox

description: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
flavorText: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector
name: Astral Protection

description: Deal 2 to ALL units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to ALL units.
flavorText: The soul of every avalanche is a pebble that would not stay put.
name: Avalanche

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: As the rows of reinforcements crested the ridge, the Outriders bowed their heads to the warmother. For with her--their Avarosa in the flesh, their queen Ashe--came the promise of peace.
name: Avarosan Outriders

description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"
name: Babbling Bjerg

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
flavorText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.
name: Baccai Sandspinner

description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Back Alley Barkeep</style></link> you've summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each Back Alley Barkeep you've summoned this game.
flavorText: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."
name: Back Alley Barkeep

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant me +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.
name: Basilisk Rider

description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavorText: "Honor the mountain." - Taric
name: Bastion

description: Grant 2 allies +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant 2 allies +2|+2.
flavorText: Warring against the gods seemed a fool's errand, but through the scars and through the screams, those brave few learned lessons. The gods thought singularly, selfishly, and had lost the gift of camaraderie. This would be their weapon. This would be their armor.
name: Battle Bonds

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Pranks</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Pranks in hand.
flavorText:
"Those who are prone to nausea should approach this gentle giant with EXTREME caution. Your insides will thank you... On a related note, I really shouldn't have eaten that second mushroom sandwich..." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 3
name: Benemone

description:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 4.
<link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Deal 2 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 4.
Countdown 1: Deal 2 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText: Bizarre forms made of dark ice sprout from every surface along the ravine, their outward-facing spikes deterring any would-be intruders.
name: Blighted Ravine

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> an enemy follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Silence an enemy follower.
flavorText: Eshiyme was once a revered oracle who used her Sight to guide those in need. But this gift was stolen from her by Camphor, who intended to feast on her inevitable anguish. How sorely the demon underestimated brave Eshiyme.
name: Blinded Mystic

description: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
flavorText: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere
name: Bloodsworn Pledge

description: An ally with 5+ Power <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An ally with 5+ Power strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "The greatest threats are the ones that go unseen." - LeBlanc
name: Bloody Business

description:
To play me, discard 2.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 2 and give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
To play me, discard 2.
Attack: Draw 2 and give them Fleeting.
flavorText: "Ain't nothing to it, most o' the time. Tables are full of fools too busy singing 'emselves hoarse to focus on the game. Not that I mind none. Coin's coin, and it's better in my pocket than theirs."
name: Brash Gambler

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
flavorText: "Nobody knows the paths of Targon like I do, so I get stuck with some of the, uh, willful stellacorns. Good thing they've got me to look after them!"
name: Broadbacked Protector

description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give me Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."
name: Brutal Hunter

flavorText: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.
name: Bull Elnuk

description:
Costs 2 less if you have a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tristana</style></link> or if you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Costs 2 less if you have a Tristana or if you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText: In every ka-blam there's a ka-boom waiting to be born.
name: Buster Shot

description: <link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Reputation: I cost 2.
flavorText: The soldier struggled as he reached for his spear, but she leaned harder on his chest until he ceased, groaning. "No, no," she admonished, showing her sharpened eyeteeth with a wicked smile. "This is mine, now."
name: Callous Bonecrusher

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
 When I <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Play: I strike an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
 When I slay a unit, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: For centuries, the Black Mist has sought out creatures all over the world, twisting and warping them; turning them into nightmarish versions of their past selves.
name: Camavoran Dragon

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of a non-<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> spell you cast last round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create in hand a Fleeting copy of a non-Fleeting spell you cast last round.
flavorText: The Blessed Isles forget. The Shadow Isles remember. The Shadow Isles forget. The Blessed Isles remember.
name: Catalogue of Regrets

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally, then revive it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally, then revive it.
flavorText: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.
name: Chronicler of Ruin

description: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Longtooth</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and summon Longtooth.
flavorText: "Shark!" - Fizz
name: Chum the Waters

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Clouds</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Mushroom Clouds in hand.
flavorText: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Chump Whump

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”
name: Citybreaker

description: When you summon an ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavorText:
My dearest Kay, 
They arrived this morning in a line of ships that broke the horizon and blotted out the sunrise. Their machines set fire to the Silver Plains, and now a thick smoke crawls through the summer air. We can stand by no longer. Rake or shovel, scythe or sword, today we must go to meet our destiny. 
Know that I love you and our home more than I have words to write.
- Charred letter
name: Coastal Defender

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy to summon a <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Tail of the Dragon</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy to summon a Tail of the Dragon.
flavorText: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon
name: Concussive Palm

description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
flavorText: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."
name: Crimson Awakener

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
flavorText: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.
name: Crowd Favorite

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Overwhelm.
flavorText: Those seeking to scale Targon would do well to befriend the local fauna. No creature is more familiar with Targon's perilous gauntlet, and none can travel more swiftly across its icy terrain.
name: Crystal Ibex

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Swap my stats with another unit.
descriptionRaw: Play: Swap my stats with another unit.
flavorText:
"A new slotbot? Didn't they shut down the plant that made these years ago?"
"I thought so. Something about 'rolling bombs' and 'unintended conflagration."
"Huh."
"...Wanna play?"
"Absolutely yes."
- Zaunite patrons
name: Defective Swapbot

description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
<link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
Recall a unit.
Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "Fall back! It's time for another to take center stage!" - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Defiant Dance
