description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
flavorText: No.
name: Deny

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Desert Naturalist

description:
Grant allied <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Grant allied Sand Soldiers everywhere +1|+0.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: They do not rest. They do not hesitate. They are uncompromising, unfeeling, unyielding.
name: Desert's Wrath

description: Pick a unit to <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> your Nexus, then kill it.
descriptionRaw: Pick a unit to strike your Nexus, then kill it.
flavorText: "I have given everything to find her, and yet it is not enough." - Viego
name: Despair

description: Once you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant me +3|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Once you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText:
"Okay, so dis is CLIFF! He's a big ol' fella who's been aroun' da block QUITE A FEW times let me tell you. An' I know dat he looks cool and I know dat he seems like a nice guy, but he's got a lotta heavy stuff on his back, and sometimes it falls on people so BE CAREFUL okay? Thank you moving on!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 4
name: Earth Elemental

description: When you summon another ally, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: "Small sparks become a raging blaze. We are the embers of your destruction!"
name: Ember Monk

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand a random Epic card from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand a random Epic card from your regions.
flavorText: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."
name: Eminent Benefactor

description: Grant ALL allies in deck and hand +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant ALL allies in deck and hand +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavorText:
"Mind or body, I fear that the nightmares of the Shadow Isles will break us all eventually, and insanity will reign forever."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Encroaching Shadows

description: When I'm summoned, grant all ally Poros a random keyword.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all ally Poros a random keyword.
flavorText: There is one figure said to be legendary to all porokind. It is said that, as he travels, he bestows his deserving furry friends with all manner of magical forged gifts.
name: Fabled Poro

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavorText: "Shh! This way! We've gotta make a sharp left after the walking treehouse, then go straight past the talking flowers. Lu, you listening to me? Lu? Lu! LULU! Do. NOT. Feed them. Do not do that."
name: Fae Guide

description: Grant me +2|+0 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+0 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "The people of this city worship at the feet of 'intelligence'. But what good is the greatest mind without the means to express itself? No. I will show Piltover true greatness. It will tower over them. It will blot out the sun. And it will carry my name." - Albus Ferros
name: Ferros Skycruiser

description: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1.
flavorText: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.
name: Field Musicians

description: Grant an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>. If it already has it, grant it <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link> instead.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack. If it already has it, grant it Double Attack instead.
flavorText: "Hit often, hit fast, and hit hard." - Horns of the Dragon
name: Flurry of Fists

description: All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"
name: Funsmith

description: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani
name: Fury of the North

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Vanguard Cavalry</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, transform me into Vanguard Cavalry.
flavorText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.
name: Gallant Rider

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Rally.
flavorText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV
name: Golden Aegis

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "Our shining future lies just beneath the sands, and it is up to us to pave the way for Azir. The golden empire in the desert will rise again!"
name: Golden Ambassador

description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"
name: Gotcha!

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Loyal Badgerbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Loyal Badgerbear.
flavorText: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."
name: Grizzled Ranger

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
flavorText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip
name: Ground Slam

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon another Yordle follower that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon another Yordle follower that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "Alice here holds two shots: one's a greeting, the other's a farewell. You two wanna meet?"
name: Gruff Grenadier

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally unit or landmark to <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally unit or landmark to Recall an enemy unit or landmark.
flavorText: "Trevvvvorrrrrr, come baaaack..." - Trevor's house
name: Homecoming

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Golden Narwhal</style></link> for your opponent.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Golden Narwhal for your opponent.
flavorText: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.
name: Hunting Fleet

description: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 and give it Fleeting.
flavorText: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook
name: Insightful Investigator

description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Scout.
flavorText:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous
name: Island Navigator

description: Whenever your opponent draws, plant 1 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Trap</style></link> randomly in the top 10 cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Whenever your opponent draws, plant 1 Flashbomb Trap randomly in the top 10 cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText:
"Officer was witnessed pursuing suspect at a high speed into a trap of her own making. Following the arrest, officer proceeded to submit her own speeding citation and fine, claiming (somewhat dramatically) 'Justice is a two-way street.'" 
- Excerpt from a Warden beat report
name: Justice Rider

flavorText: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."
name: Kinkou Lifeblade

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon 2 different 1 cost allies from your deck.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon 2 different 1 cost allies from your deck.
flavorText: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.
name: Kinkou Wayfinder

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally +2|+2.
flavorText: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."
name: Laurent Bladekeeper

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create in hand another random <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> follower from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create in hand another random Challenger follower from your regions.
flavorText: "...Good grief." - Fiora
name: Laurent Chevalier

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Dart</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Create a Fleeting Poison Dart in hand.
flavorText: Don't get him started.
name: Lecturing Yordle

description: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.
name: Legion Veteran

description: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, Nab 1.
flavorText: "So, what are you willin' to wager, friend?" - Tahm Kench
name: Loaded Dice

description: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
descriptionRaw: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
flavorText: "We're rich!" - Jagged Butcher
name: Lost Riches

description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+2 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook
name: Mageseeker Inciter

description: When I'm summoned, create 5 random 6+ cost spells in your deck and lower their cost to 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 5 random 6+ cost spells in your deck and lower their cost to 3.
flavorText: The Marai's ancestral home is protected by the celestial light of a moonstone. Every hundred years, its light begins to wane, and a new Tidecaller is tasked with finding another--for without it, the Marai people would be plunged into darkness, and fall prey to the horrors that lurk in the depths.
name: Marai Greatmother

description:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
<link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
Allegiance: Invoke.
flavorText: "There is much to learn from the stars, from their guidance. For us, they are a constant, a way to chart our path."
name: Mountain Scryer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
flavorText:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"
name: Mystifying Magician

description: Costs 2 less if you've <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> a unit this round.
descriptionRaw: Costs 2 less if you've Recalled a unit this round.
flavorText:
"Himon'she, it is an honor to travel with you. The others tell me you are wise beyond measure. Where are we heading?"
"Oh dear. I was following you!" - Ahri and the Pathless Ancient
name: Pathless Ancient

description: Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz
name: Playful Trickster

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link> and give a random enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round for each time you've activated <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Summon a Powder Monkey and give a random enemy Vulnerable this round for each time you've activated Plunder this game.
flavorText: "Oh, those little sootballs aren't so bad. Here's a tip for you--they like fireworks. So, you take out an enemy's gunpowder stores, and the monkeys, well, they'll do the rest." - Miss Fortune
name: Powder Pandemonium

description: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."
name: Professor von Yipp

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "My friend, for you I've procured this incomparable beauty straight from the fabled Tomb of the Emperors and pulled it right from the hand of the great Renekton himself and as I rode out, I was surrounded by ten--twenty!--bloodthirsty sauren riders! Truly, a miracle that such a treasure has made it to your hands."
name: Profiteer

description: Grant an allied landmark "My <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown</style></link> completion effect activates twice".
descriptionRaw: Grant an allied landmark "My Countdown completion effect activates twice".
flavorText: "Mortals spend so much of their time waiting. My fondest hope is that they all should be rewarded for their patience." - Zilean
name: Promising Future

description:
Grant an ally +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+1.
Rally.
flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian
name: Relentless Pursuit

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Fiend</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
flavorText: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”
name: Ren Shadowblade

description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
name: Riposte

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus
name: Riptide

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavorText: The mistwraiths move through planes unseen by mortal eyes, appear without warning, and inflict misery on all they encounter.
name: Risen Mists

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton
name: Rite of Dominance

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
name: Rite of Negation

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Midnight Raid</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Midnight Raid in hand.
flavorText: When her sentence ended, Thea knew she could never rejoin her people. War - and Noxus - had changed her, made her a killer. She wouldn't know peace. Instead, she put her newfound skills to use for coin in the arenas.
name: Ruined Reckoner

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+2. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the strongest ally +2|+2.
flavorText: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.
name: Salt Spire

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2.
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 2.
Draw 2.
flavorText: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk...
name: Salvage

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.
name: Sandcrafter

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
flavorText: "Hello, fellow Chem-Barons!"
name: Shady Character

description: Fill your hand with <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Fill your hand with Gems.
flavorText: "Turn a gem just so, and it glimmers in the light. Like mortal lives, each has its own inner fire." - Taric
name: Shards of the Mountain

description: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
descriptionRaw: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
flavorText: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."
name: Shiraza the Blade

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant Spider allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant Spider allies +1|+0.
flavorText: "Go on, my sweet. Let the others hear your call. You know how it excites them. You know it pleases me." - Elise
name: Shrieking Spinner

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
name: Sigil of Malice

flavorText: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.
name: Silverwing Diver

description: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
flavorText: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.
name: Silverwing Vanguard

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.
name: Solari Sunforger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavorText: In shadow they lurk, waiting for a weary nod or an absent mind. Then claws, a gaping maw, and finally, darkness.
name: Spirit Leech

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen
name: Spirit's Refuge

description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
flavorText: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.
name: Stand Alone

description: When you heal a damaged ally, give it <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When you heal a damaged ally, give it Elusive this round.
flavorText: "Stars stay with us for only so long. Once they have been tended to, I return them to the sky in a sudden blaze of starlight... and flailing hooves."
name: Stargazer

description:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
flavorText: "And that's how we discovered arc discharge! Of course, my predecessor had hypothesized such an event, but underestimated the arc's reach. Poor fellow..." - Heimerdinger
name: Statikk Shock

description: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of your <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of your Darkness everywhere by 1.
flavorText:
"It is important, when assembling one's cabal, that each maniacal member brings something unique to the supervillain table. One of my fellows, for instance, has a lethal sense of style..."
- Excerpt from Ch. 4 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Stilted Robemaker

description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Frostbite an enemy.
Summon a Frozen Thrall.
flavorText: "The cold elicits many reactions. Let us find out yours." - Lissandra
name: Succumb to the Cold

description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Grow an ally to 4|4.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Grow an ally to 4|4.
flavorText: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
name: Suit Up!

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sumpworks Map</style></link> in hand. It costs 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Create a Sumpworks Map in hand. It costs 0 this round.
flavorText: The Zaunite kids soon started exploring the old mining tunnels and deeper levels of the Lanes. What a world they discovered. What friends they found.
name: Sumpsnipe Scavenger

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Silverwing Vanguard</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Blinding Assault</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Fleetfeather Tracker</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Create a Silverwing Vanguard, Blinding Assault, or Fleetfeather Tracker in hand.
Attack: Give other Challenging allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: The very sight of the Swiftwing flight inspires Demacian soldiers on fields far below. Upon seeing them descend through the clouds, those on the ground are reinvigorated, and ready to continue the fight.
name: Swiftwing Flight

description: When I’m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and Elusive.
flavorText: "What's my secret? You'll have to ask the biceps. They do all the talking."
name: Swole Scout

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Double my Power.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Double my Power.
flavorText: His secret is acorn powder shakes, four times a day.
name: Swole Squirrel

description: When I'm summoned, if you've played a created card or killed a unit with a spell this game, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Bass of Burden</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've played a created card or killed a unit with a spell this game, summon a Bass of Burden.
flavorText: If Veigar needed help tipping the scales of justice, then none were better suited to the job than these two. They knew all of them. Except the mixolydian one.
name: Tenor of Terror

description: <style=Variable></style>
flavorText:
"Fear not the blasted beast ye know,
For some survive their thunder,
But what of them that broke the bow,
An' took them poor souls under?" - Found scratched into a Bilgewater tavern beam
name: The Beast Below

description: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
flavorText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh
name: The Box

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, show me the way,
Tear the sky open,
Show me beyond."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Fangs

description: When a non-<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> ally in hand is discarded, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: When a non-Fleeting ally in hand is discarded, create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Under cover of night, Lady Faris Noradi led her Gray Legion out of the Noxian capital. It took three hard, bloody weeks, but they finally neared the small Demacian outpost her scouts had identified. It was time for the demonstration.
name: The Lady of Blood

description: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +1|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your strongest ally +1|+0.
flavorText: It is here, in the Spirit Realm, that Alune communes with her brother Aphelios. It is she who speaks words of comfort to the silent assassin, and who reaches through the veil to hand him his weapons of retribution.
name: The Veiled Temple

description: Give an ally +5|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +5|+0 this round.
flavorText: "You will act with grace and courtesy. You will flatter, you will disarm. You will listen. You will learn. And, when it is time, you will strike, and you WILL kill." - LeBlanc
name: Thorned Blade

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant me <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me Regeneration.
flavorText: Once they were among the Avarosan huts, they called Hgar forward. With a laugh, she raised Snowsunder, ready to use the weapon to batter the wooden homes into little more than splinters.
name: Troll Ravager

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard
name: Vanguard Bannerman

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.
name: Vanguard Firstblade

description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire
name: Vanguard Squire

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: Tena waited patiently as her pet's caustic spittle wore away the gilded bars of the palace's rear gate. Around the corner, she would soon find a hoard of unspeakably valuable treasure--more than enough to bring Vekaura back to its former glory.
name: Vekauran Safecracker

description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
flavorText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."
name: Voice of the Risen

description: Each round, the first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit with a spell, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you slay a unit with a spell, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Pups is pups." - Wisdom scrawled upon the soul
name: Watcher on the Isles

description: Deal 2 to a champion or 7 to a follower.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a champion or 7 to a follower.
flavorText: "One life in return for so many. One life so that others might thrive." - Nasus
name: Weight of Judgment

description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Squirrel</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round.
descriptionRaw: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round.
flavorText: "Adoribus!" - Lulu
name: Whimsy!

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 2. 
Draw 2.
flavorText: Before the news, the rumors. Before the rumors, the play. Before the play, the plot.
name: Whispered Words

flavorText: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.
name: Whiteflame Protector

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit.
flavorText: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.
name: Will of Ionia

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Get an empty mana gem.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Get an empty mana gem.
flavorText: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.
name: Wolfrider

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavorText: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.
name: Wraithcaller

description: When you summon another ally with equal or less Power than me, grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally with equal or less Power than me, grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: "Adventuring means finding baddies, and turning them into friends!"
name: Yordle Captain

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Warning Shot</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Nab 1 and create a Warning Shot in hand.
flavorText: "Y'know, friends love to help friends out. And you? I like the shine in your eye and the glint on your cutlass! It is a really, really nice cutlass."
name: Yordle Grifter

description: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
flavorText: Zap once completed the Azure Way circuit in just under three minutes. She even had to dodge the Jilldaw's shattered hull near the end! The currents that day were AWESOME.
name: Zap Sprayfin

description:
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Draw 1.
flavorText:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"
name: Abyssal Eye

description: When I'm discarded, grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally +2|+0.
flavorText: As Lady Noradi's powers grew, she pondered whether her powers would take root in the corpses lining Noxus's oldest tombs. She found the light of life a mere flicker in the husks, but from those wilting flames, the shadows of war still danced.
name: Ancient Warmonger

description: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
flavorText: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.
name: Arachnoid Host

description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."
name: Avarosan Hearthguard

description: Grant an ally +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +3|+3.
flavorText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric
name: Blessing of Targon

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Blade Dance 2.
flavorText:
"There are those who think a flower is a fragile, delicate thing. They forget how much strength it takes to hold fast to the humble earth and inspire hope with every bloom."
- Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Blossoming Blade

description: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: Neither ruby nor sapphire surpass the luster of the aeon stone--a brilliant gem with legendary restorative properties.
name: Catalyst of Aeons

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavorText: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, gatekeeper
name: Chempunk Shredder

description: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
flavorText: "Beware the ice... and more importantly... beware what lies within!" - Scrawled on a Freljord inn wall
name: Cold Resistance

description: Pick an enemy. 2 allies <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> it one after another.
descriptionRaw: Pick an enemy. 2 allies strike it one after another.
flavorText: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden
name: Concerted Strike

description: Place an enemy follower into the enemy deck, then your opponent draws 1.
descriptionRaw: Place an enemy follower into the enemy deck, then your opponent draws 1.
flavorText: The grand city of Piltover is home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra. Piltover's jails are also home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra.
name: Coup de Grace

description: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Nothing lasts on these haunted isles. All will end.
name: Crumble

description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
name: Decimate

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Swain
name: Decisive Maneuver

description:
Costs 2 less if you cast 2+ spells last round.
Draw 2 other spells.
descriptionRaw:
Costs 2 less if you cast 2+ spells last round.
Draw 2 other spells.
flavorText: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.
name: Deep Meditation

description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: An ally Captures a unit.
flavorText: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader
name: Detain

description:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "I always shoot first." - Miss Fortune
name: Double Up

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If the <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown</style></link> of any of your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> is 4 or less, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> them to 0.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round End: If the Countdown of any of your Frozen Thralls is 4 or less, advance them to 0.
flavorText: "My lady appears to me in dreams, her voice near a whisper. 'Follow,' she bids me. This command I dare not disobey."
name: Draklorn Inquisitor

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated Nightfall this game.
flavorText: With every setting sun, the night unfurls its dark wings, and blots out the day's last remnants of hope.
name: Duskrider

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in place with the unit stored inside.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate a unit to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the unit stored inside.
flavorText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra
name: Entomb

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
flavorText: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!
name: Ethereal Remitter

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy, then stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy, then stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: "Just... stay right there..." - Veigar
name: Event Horizon

description:
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Summon a copy of me with <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw:
Countdown 1: Stun the 2 weakest enemies.
Daybreak: Summon a copy of me with Countdown 2.
flavorText: "Let the sun shed Her light upon us. Those who are weak and unworthy will cower before Her gaze!" - Solari Priestess
name: Eye of the Ra-Horak

description:
When I'm summoned, grant <link=keyword.Reckless><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Can't Block</style></link> to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Risen Reckoner</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
Last Breath: Create a Risen Reckoner in hand.
flavorText:
"The first minotaurs I revived were docile, useless beasts. Neither the thrum of war nor the threat of death could stir their senses."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Fallen Reckoner

description: For every 2 spells you cast in a round, grant other allies +1|+1.<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: For every 2 spells you cast in a round, grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "LISTEN HERE, SOWDIER. I'LL HAVE YOU KNOW I HAVE OVA FWEE-HUNDWED CONFIRMED KWILLS AND I'M DA TOP ADMIWAL IN ALL DA MAWINE'S FORCES SO WHEN I SAY SWIM, YOU BETTA SWIM, OKAY? OKAY THANK YOU!"
name: Fleet Admiral Shelly

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: The colossi are ancient and venerated protectors of Targon's most revered sites. To harm them is to insult the mountain itself. To torture them is a crime no Targonian can forgive.
name: Freed Colossus

flavorText: Countless challenges await those climbing Mount Targon. Some, like the endless ascent, slowly sap the aspirants' strength. Others are much more immediate.
name: Fused Firebrand

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to summon an exact Ephemeral copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
flavorText:
"More
Know I got it,
So here you go,
You look like you could use some more."
- Akali, 'MORE'
name: Go Get It

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 3 from any unit.
descriptionRaw: Drain 3 from any unit.
flavorText: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.
name: Grasp of the Undying

flavorText: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.
name: Greathorn Companion

description: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions everywhere +2|+2 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: The Herald spread her arms wide as she lifted her face to the sun, which hung bloody and red above Shurima. "Hail, the Magus Ascendant," she breathed beatifically, her voice echoing off the ring of ruined columns. "Hail, Xerath!"
name: Herald of the Magus

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it survives, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it survives, Stun it.
flavorText: "Move it!" - Poppy
name: Heroic Charge

description: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "We few are Iceborn, our bloodlines infused with the Freljord's magic. Our ancestors locked away an ancient evil, and now we few stand guard to defend against its return." - Gregor the Guardian
name: Iceborn Legacy

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all enemies with 4 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Stun all enemies with 4 or less Power.
flavorText: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster
name: Intimidating Roar

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sleep with the Fishes</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Sleep with the Fishes in hand.
flavorText: Years in the boxing ring taught Jack valuable lessons. He learned that if his opponent can bleed, they can fear. He learned the power of a silent stare. He learned the power of uncontrolled violence.
name: Jack, the Winner

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
flavorText:
"In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle."
- Saga of the First Lands
name: Jeweled Protector

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."
name: Kato The Arm

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've Stunned or Recalled this game.
flavorText: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.
name: Legion General

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me all keywords on allies.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me all keywords on allies.
flavorText: "I'm just like you, only better."
name: Mechanized Mimic

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of me.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Summon an exact copy of me.
flavorText:
"Mr. Berz, we found you asleep INSIDE the vault, covered in golden cogs and clutching the safe's broken door."
"Weren't me. Jus' some fella wot look like me."
"You're still holding the door."
"Prove it."
name: Midenstokke Henchmen

description: Each round, the first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit with a spell, summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you slay a unit with a spell, summon an Ephemeral Mistwraith.
flavorText: The Black Mist traps its victims in endless cycles of self-imposed torment. Through the Mistcatchers, Tek and Kana give those souls a chance to break that cycle for themselves.
name: Mistkeepers

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Invoke.
flavorText: "Look at all our friends out in the sky tonight! See that extra bright star? That's the Messenger's eye staring down at us! That dim cluster way out there? It is the Trickster hiding behind clouds! And that one over--KULUN, SHH! You cannot paw those down...!"
name: Moondreamer

description:
<link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> 2 enemy units this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: They can't block this round.
descriptionRaw:
Silence 2 enemy units this round.
Nightfall: They can't block this round.
flavorText: "Those unaccustomed to the moonlight must learn to see by it, or they will see nothing at all." - Diana
name: Moonlight Affliction

description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Activate all ally <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effects at once.
descriptionRaw:
Give allies +2|+2 this round.
Daybreak: Activate all ally Daybreak effects at once.
flavorText: "We rise with the dawn! March into the light!" - Leona
name: Morning Light

description: Pick a player to discard their lowest cost card to draw 3.
descriptionRaw: Pick a player to discard their lowest cost card to draw 3.
flavorText: "Everything has a cost." - Corina Veraza
name: Most Wanted

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has Support, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
flavorText: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.
name: Mountain Sojourners

description: When another ally dies, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal
name: Neverglade Collector

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Liminal Guardian</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Liminal Guardian.
flavorText: The forest needed a guardian, someone who could stand sentry at its borders for years, maybe centuries, without moving. Gai'sh was an eager volunteer and promptly proved his dedication with a ten-year nap.
name: Nine Lives

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally and the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Your strongest ally and the weakest enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Noxkraya Arena

description: When I’m summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Most Wanted</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, create a Most Wanted in hand.
flavorText: From unloading silently into the street to prepping the ram, setup didn't take long. It was just a matter of waiting on Caitlyn's cue.
name: Officer Squad

description: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
flavorText:
"You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
Back and I’m better and ready to stay."
- Kai'Sa, 'THE BADDEST'
name: Out Of The Way

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
flavorText: "An' den DAT Bobjim da poro was like "DAT WAY!" an' so off dey went into da horizahn, with da other poros scamperin' behind, tryin' their bestest to keep up!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Poro Sled

description: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies or landmarks already.)
descriptionRaw: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies or landmarks already.)
flavorText: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.
name: Possession

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> an allied landmark 3 rounds.
descriptionRaw: Play: Advance an allied landmark 3 rounds.
flavorText: Whenever he seeks a moment's peace, Zilean returns to Icathia's last garden, just as he remembers it.
name: Preservationist

description: If you've played <style=Variable>20</style> cards with different names this game, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Catastrophe</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: If you've played 20 cards with different names this game, summon Catastrophe.
flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project engineer
name: Purrsuit of Perfection

description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign
name: Radiant Guardian

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
flavorText: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"
name: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 4+ units this game, an enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: If you've slain 4+ units this game, an enemy and I strike each other.
flavorText: The bearer of a grudge's resentment only deepens, even if those they bear the grudge against are long dead.
name: Rampaging Baccai

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "I've heard he'll swim miles to find his mark, 'n when he finds 'em, he never misses his shot. Not sure if he's a man or a fish, but it's clear he knows these waters far better'n we do." - Jagged Butcher
name: Razorscale Hunter

description:
When I count down, summon a random 1 cost follower.
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Grant 1 cost allies +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I count down, summon a random 1 cost follower.
Countdown 2: Grant 1 cost allies +2|+1 and Fearsome.
flavorText: "Ye think ye've got what it takes to call yourself a Hook, do ye? We'll see, ye tyke. By the time we're done with ye, ye'll either be worth yer weight, or ye'll be weighed down below the waves, bait fer the beasts!" - Petty Officer
name: Reaver's Row

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
flavorText: "See that star moving across the night sky? That's a grown stellacorn. While the young ones lend us their healing magic until they can be returned to the sky, grown stellacorns can wield that power on their own. It is considered very lucky to see one and know it for what it is. Luckier still to care for one." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
name: Resplendent Stellacorn

description: When you target me, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you target me, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: After countless battles, Beryn had vowed to never again raise his sword, even if it meant forfeiting his life. But when the strange mists swept through Noxus and overtook Thea, he knew he had to break his promise. He would free her, no matter the cost.
name: Retired Reckoner

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."
name: Rimetusk Shaman

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Stormcloud</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Stormcloud.
flavorText: Weaving a Stormcloud took time. Time Rissu didn't have. Her hands worked furiously as the Aberration closed in. A bit of cloud here, some lightning there. Then... CRACK! BOOM! She had done it, but would it be enough?
name: Rissu, The Silent Storm

flavorText: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.
name: Ruin Runner

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Cast <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Cannon Barrage</style></link> on randomly targeted enemies for each card you've drawn this round, up to 6 times. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Cast Cannon Barrage on randomly targeted enemies for each card you've drawn this round, up to 6 times.
flavorText: "...Rex?" - Petty Officer
name: Ruined Rex

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
flavorText: The horizon before her sang with energy. Where others saw sand and silt, she saw the ley lines, blinding lattices of pure energy that were hers for the taking.
name: Sandseer

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
flavorText: As they passed through the ravine, the Sandcrafter spoke the words of magic. A gust of wind echoed through the canyon and turned to the thunder of oncoming hooves.
name: Sandswept Tomb

flavorText: "The weak harvest, but the strong take. The little Avarosans will learn which they are!"
name: Scarmaiden Reaver

flavorText: All creatures are fiercely protective of their young, but few are as well equipped to deal with would-be threats as a dragon.
name: Screeching Dragon

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> each ally and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Recall each ally and summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavorText: "Let them strike at shadows, where their weapons will find no purchase." - Zed
name: Shadows of the Past

description: Refill your spell mana. Give an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> and +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Refill your spell mana. Give an ally Elusive and +1|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"I SEE them enter the left shell, yet when I CHOOSE that shell, it's empty. I'm beginning to suspect this game might be rigged..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 14
name: Shell Game

description: Deal 2 to an enemy, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy, then Rally.
flavorText: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.
name: Shunpo

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
name: Siphoning Strike

flavorText: "Swear I seen the strangest things over them reefs, Cap'n. Wha's that lunk put in 'em oranges? Tha's what I wanna know..." - Petty Officer
name: Slippery Waverider

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.
name: Sneaky Zeebles

description: Kill a unit, then revive it.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit, then revive it.
flavorText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb
name: Spirit Journey

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 4.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 4.
flavorText: "Look to the stars. If you're lucky, I'll look back." - Aurelion Sol
name: Starshaping

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0.
flavorText: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...
name: Subpurrsible

description:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
descriptionRaw:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your strongest ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Survival Skills

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a random Elite in hand.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a random Elite in hand.
flavorText: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen
name: Swiftwing Lancer

description: Each round, the first time you <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a follower, summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you Recall a follower, summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
flavorText: Mystery is a greater thing than its conclusion.
name: Tail-Cloak Matriarch

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
flavorText: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.
name: Targon's Peak

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavorText: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere
name: Tarkaz the Tribeless

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Win the game if you've summoned units from 10 regions. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Win the game if you've summoned units from 10 regions.
flavorText: Stretching an unknowable distance into the heavens above, The Bandle Tree is an impossible fixture at the heart of the city. Under its great, gnarled branches, some yordles see a beacon of hope and friendship while others see an ominous, riddle-filled monolith. All agree that to gaze upon the Bandle Tree is to glance into the soul of something very old and very powerful.
name: The Bandle Tree

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, our night is set,
May we halt those who would harm us,
And teach them regret."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Cloven Way

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Clockling</style></link>.
If you've <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> this game, summon 2 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Clockling.
If you've Predicted this game, summon 2 instead.
flavorText: "Come here and stop fussing! You have sand in your gears." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer
name: The Time Has Come

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them Fleeting.
flavorText: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.
name: The University of Piltover

description: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
flavorText: He toiled night and day, perfecting his composition. Then, in the blink of an eye, a dark silence blew through him. Others screamed and ran for their lives. He noticed nothing.
name: Tortured Prodigy

description: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random <style=Variable>1</style> cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random 1 cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
flavorText: "...and in one, two, and THREE!!! Oh. Oh, my word... Yet another unforeseen outcome?!" - Heimerdinger
name: Tri-beam Improbulator

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
flavorText: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General
name: Trifarian Assessor

flavorText: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius
name: Trifarian Shieldbreaker

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and shuffle the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and shuffle the rest into your deck.
flavorText: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Scarmother Vrynna
name: Troop of Elnuks

description: Grant me +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +4|+0 and Quick Attack once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.
name: Unstable Voltician

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: I transform into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Stormclaw Ursine</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: I transform into Stormclaw Ursine.
flavorText: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.
name: Ursine Spiritwalker

flavorText: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.
name: Vanguard Cavalry

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavorText: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?
name: Vaults of Helia

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText:
"Okay, Barb. That's the last of the guards on this floor, but we've still gotta keep a low profile."
"BLARGH-BLAAA!"
"Inside voice, Barbara."
"Blarb."
"That's my girl."
name: Vekauran Bruiser

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it has <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it has Overwhelm, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Oooh the wildman's looking EXTRA savage today! Stay clear of those claws, folks!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Wild Claws

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Drain 2 from 2 enemies.
flavorText: "I will take what I want, and dispense with what I don't." - Viego
name: Withering Mist

description: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: That which kills us makes them stronger.
name: Withering Wail

flavorText: "There is nothing like hunting another soldier. To track them, you must think and feel as they do. To catch them, you must fear them as they fear you. It is a bond that few will know, but one I savor above all others."
name: Wrathful Rider

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: If I have 8+ Power, give me <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: If I have 8+ Power, give me Fearsome, Overwhelm, and SpellShield this round.
flavorText: "It is said that hundreds of years ago, the river Khaleek bore a great trading outpost known as Taraleek upon its shores. That is, until one fateful day, when a mighty beast broke through the ground, and annihilated both the outpost and all who called it home. But what monster could do such a thing?" - Shuriman historian
name: Xerxa'Reth, The Undertitan

description: Destroy a landmark or create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a landmark or create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
flavorText: "Hang on - we're rollin'!" - Bomber Twins
name: Yordle Contraption

description: Give allies +2|+2 this round. If you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions, give allies +4|+4 instead. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Give allies +2|+2 this round. If you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions, give allies +4|+4 instead.
flavorText: "We... look so cool right now." - Tristana
name: Yordles in Arms

flavorText: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."
name: Yusari

flavorText: The power of a warhorse, the thoughtless savagery of a cat.
name: Alpha Wildclaw

description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: Though the Noxians had laid their trap well, still no-one knew the woods better than Demacia's scouts. Every snapped branch, every footprint was a clue that led them closer to their prince.
name: Ardent Tracker

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "How do I do it? Screamin' matches night after night? Gargle engine oil. Five minutes in the mornin', five at night."
name: Arena Mechacaster

description: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
descriptionRaw: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
flavorText: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider
name: Armored Tuskrider

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If you cast a spell on me this round, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Round End: If you cast a spell on me this round, I strike the weakest enemy.
flavorText:
