"Hide, we will find you. 
Breathe, we will hear you.
Run, we will kill you."
name: Arrel the Tracker

description: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
descriptionRaw: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
flavorText: "The future will be written by the Ascended!" - Azir
name: Ascended's Rise

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Forge Workers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Forge Workers.
flavorText: "Shift change!" - Forge Chief
name: Assembly Line

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
flavorText: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.
name: Augmented Experimenter

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant an ally Overwhelm and Regeneration.
flavorText: It is said that very few trolls are taught the chants of the Old Ones, and that those who know them can call on their forebears to imbue their brethren with exceptional strength.
name: Augur of the Old Ones

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all damaged enemies.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Stun all damaged enemies.
flavorText: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”
name: Aurok Glinthorn

description: Create 2 random Poros and 2 <link=card.snaxRef><style=AssociatedCard>Poro Snax</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create 2 random Poros and 2 Poro Snax in hand.
flavorText:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Aurora Porealis

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck. 
Traps on enemy cards are doubled when activated.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round End: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck. 
Traps on enemy cards are doubled when activated.
flavorText: "Rule 378: A good scout is always brave, always prepared, and always daring!"
name: Ava Achiever

description:
If you would get a mana gem, instead refill your spell mana.
When you cast a spell, create in hand a random spell that costs 3 or less and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
If you would get a mana gem, instead refill your spell mana.
When you cast a spell, create in hand a random spell that costs 3 or less and give it Fleeting.
flavorText: To the Marai, the Leo'lei is a herald of great change. It is said each flourish of its graceful wings influences the flow of the tides.
name: Avatar of the Tides

description: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion
name: Back to Back

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +4|+0.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me +4|+0.
flavorText:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."
name: Battering Ram

description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Summon 3 Spiderlings, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
flavorText: They're hungriest when they hatch.
name: Brood Awakening

description: When I'm summoned, if you've targeted allies 6+ times this game, grant me <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link>, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've targeted allies 6+ times this game, grant me Spellshield, Overwhelm, and Challenger.
flavorText: For centuries, the demon Camphor stalked the lands of Targon, pulling from her victims the very strengths that defined them. From the mighty, she would take strength; from the wise, wisdom. But she had no interest in these boons. Instead, she feasted on the suffering, doubt, and misery she inflicted. Camphor was a monster in every sense of the word.
name: Camphor, the Doubt

description: When you draw a card, give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> and create an exact copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: When you draw a card, give it Fleeting and create an exact copy of it in hand.
flavorText: At age five, she made the world's first multi-frequency sonic knife. While not very practical (she mostly used it to slice sandwiches), it set her on her way to the Wardens' elite Armaments Department.
name: Chief Mechanist Zevi

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
flavorText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”
name: Cithria the Bold

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then Rally.
flavorText: "All sailors think they so tough! Grr this. Yarr that. Yes yes. Very good. But you still need orange! Make skin pretty, make teeth stay, and make me happy. So you eat, or you swim. Easy."
name: Citrus Courier

description: Your <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> and <link=keyword.Focus><sprite name=Focus><style=Keyword>Focus</style></link> spells cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: Your Burst and Focus spells cost 1 less.
flavorText: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.
name: Cloud Drinker

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly or activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps randomly or activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: Corina smiled as the Piltover Wardens burst down her door, as they trampled her precious flowers underfoot, as they sent up clouds of toxic pollen. All as planned.
name: Corina, Mastermind

description: When you pick a non-champion card from randomly selected options, create a copy in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you pick a non-champion card from randomly selected options, create a copy in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: Famously shy, the elusive shellfolk are known to hide in their shells until their curiosity gets the better of them. Once emerged, their playful personalities become fully engaged, including a propensity to play tricks by expertly mimicking the sound of other sea life.
name: Curious Shellfolk

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me and an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Give me and an ally Elusive this round.
flavorText: The Lunari waited for nightfall and the safety it assured. The path ahead seemed deserted, but Cygnus knew the Solari camp lay just beyond. He gestured, and the others quietly fell in line behind him.
name: Cygnus the Moonstalker

description: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're Ephemeral.
flavorText: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed
name: Dawn and Dusk

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavorText:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"
name: Devourer of the Depths

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If the ally is multi-region, it <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the enemy again.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If the ally is multi-region, it strikes the enemy again.
flavorText: "The Acorn M1-85: a fully-automatic, oak caliber rifle with a bandlewood scope, and a purpleberry finish. Yeah, mama's cookin' up something good tonight!" - Bandle Commando
name: Double Tap

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, Rally.
flavorText:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia
name: Dragonguard Lookout

description: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant
name: For Demacia!

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.
name: Genevieve Elmheart

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite 2 enemies.
flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia
name: Harsh Winds

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Combine all of our Poros into a <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Fluft of Poros</style></link>, it gains their stats and keywords.
descriptionRaw: Play: Combine all of our Poros into a Fluft of Poros, it gains their stats and keywords.
flavorText:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!"
"Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."
name: Heart of the Fluft

description: When you draw or create me in hand or each <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: while I'm in your hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
descriptionRaw: When you draw or create me in hand or each Round Start: while I'm in your hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
flavorText:
"...configuring hextech into a stable state was the most difficult hurdle I faced. Most nights, it felt like the crystals and hexite were actively conspiring to trip me up, and it was only through extensive trial and error that I was able to get the component parts working in harmony..."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal
name: Hextech Anomaly

description: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
descriptionRaw: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
flavorText:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"
name: Hextech Transmogulator

description: Costs 2 less if you've created 2+ cards this game. Draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Costs 2 less if you've created 2+ cards this game. Draw 2.
flavorText: Very few outsiders know the way to Bandle City, but strange markings in the rocks and trees of Runeterra offer hints to those who know what to look for.
name: Hidden Pathways

flavorText: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Horns of the Dragon

description: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: To receive the blessing of Azir is a great honor - to give a blessing in his name, an honor greater still.
name: Inspiring Marshal

description: When an ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> kills an enemy for the first time each round, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
descriptionRaw: When an ally with Fury kills an enemy for the first time each round, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
flavorText: "Look to the heavens, and see as I do! First the signals, for by night they shine. Then the fury, for by day all burns. You will see! We will all see!" - Herald of Dragons
name: Inviolus Vox

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. When you play your next <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> this round, copy it targeting the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. When you play your next Darkness this round, copy it targeting the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "You asked me, Senna, what brought me to this fight. I have lost nothing to the Mist, it does not threaten my home. It exists, and it should not. I am here to discover why. Do I need sentiment to join your cause?"
name: Ixtali Sentinel

description: When I'm targeted and survive, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm targeted and survive, draw 1.
flavorText: Heir apparent to Piltover's prestigious Clan Medarda, Jae preferred hunting ancient artifacts over managing the family business... much to his father's chagrin.
name: Jae Medarda

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an allied Champion or Dragon <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an allied Champion or Dragon Challenger.
flavorText: Kadregrin sowed chaos and fear long before the Black Mist reached Demacia. Under Viego's command, however, his skills would bolster all of the Ruined King's forces.
name: Kadregrin the Ruined

description: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "And don't come back!" - Poppy
name: Keeper's Verdict

description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, grant all allied copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a Prediction, grant all allied copies of me everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: Khahiri had only been gone a moment when he suddenly reappeared. Older by nearly a decade and wielding a strange and deadly-looking weapon, he was met with gasps of awe and concern.
name: Khahiri the Returned

description: Transform a unit into a 3|3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mini-Minitee</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Transform a unit into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it.
flavorText: "Oh-ho! How cute! How adorable! How TINY!" - Veigar
name: Minimorph

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Stun the weakest enemy.
flavorText: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."
name: Minotaur Reckoner

description: An ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies one after another.
descriptionRaw: An ally with Fury strikes the 2 weakest enemies one after another.
flavorText: For centuries, the Demacians only knew of a dragon's fury through legend. Wrenwall changed that.
name: Molten Breath

description:
Deal 5 to a unit.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 5 to a unit.
Plunder: I cost 2 less.
flavorText: "The beast's been stuck already, lads! Now stick it again 'til it stops thrashin' and the waters've lost their blue!" - Jagged Taskmaster
name: Monster Harpoon

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 5 from a unit.
descriptionRaw: Drain 5 from a unit.
flavorText: "Death is drawn to life." - Senna
name: Piercing Darkness

description: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
flavorText: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Reckoning

description: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
flavorText: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.
name: Redoubled Valor

description: Costs 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
descriptionRaw: Costs 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
flavorText: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian
name: Remembrance

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
name: Ricochet

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Rimefang Pack</style></link>. Grant it +1|+1 for each time you have <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbitten</style></link> enemies this game.<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Rimefang Pack. Grant it +1|+1 for each time you have Frostbitten enemies this game.
flavorText: The rimefang wolves circled the drüvask, crouched low, wary. The stench of death clung tightly to it, pungent and overwhelming.
name: Rimefang Denmother

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> 3 or when I'm destroyed: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dami'yin the Unbound</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm destroyed: Summon a Dami'yin the Unbound.
flavorText: "At each place of power shall an obelisk be raised, an instrument through which the Magus Ascendant may draw the power from beneath the sands." - Herald of the Magus
name: Risen Altar

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Inspection Passed!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Inspection Passed! in hand.
flavorText: Wilfred was originally skeptical. He was skeptical throughout, too. In fact, he was skeptical 'til the very end - but Ziggs and the other hexplosive experts proved they knew how to put on a real humdinger of a fireworks show.
name: Safety Inspector

description: When I'm summoned, draw 2 and give all other allies +1+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 2 and give all other allies +1+1 this round.
flavorText: The forest offers its secrets freely... but few bear the courage to ask questions of it.
name: Sai'nen Thousand-Tailed

description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”
name: Scarmother Vrynna

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link>, <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link>, or <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> spell.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Slow, Fast, or Burst spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavorText: The strange and hauntingly beautiful sky-songs of the Cloud Drinkers kept some of the Black Mist at bay... but only for so long.
name: Scattered Pod

description: Grant ALL battling followers <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant ALL battling followers Ephemeral.
flavorText: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.
name: Shadow Flare

description: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies Vulnerable.
flavorText: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.
name: Sheriff Lariette Rose

description:
Deal 4 to a unit.
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 4 to a unit.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: "Go. Surround them. They cannot fight the land itself." - Azir
name: Shifting Sands

description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another.
flavorText: "Firing!" - Jayce
name: Shock Blast

flavorText: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
name: Soulgorger

description: Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
flavorText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen
name: Stand United

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: From time to time, the great colossi of Targon awaken from their slumber and trek to new grounds atop the great mountain. These events are never quiet, and seldom safe.
name: Stonebreaker

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> ANY follower into your hand.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Recall ANY follower into your hand.
flavorText: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer
name: Strong-arm

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +4|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +4|+4 this round.
flavorText: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription
name: Sun Guardian

description:
Deal 6 to a unit.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Instead, <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round and deal 6 to it.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 6 to a unit.
Daybreak: Instead, Silence it this round and deal 6 to it.
flavorText: Few things survive a gaze as unflinching as the sun's.
name: Sunburst

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
flavorText: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.
name: The Howling Abyss

description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
descriptionRaw: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
flavorText: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.
name: Towering Stonehorn

description: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Illegal Contraption</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon an Illegal Contraption.
flavorText: "Their mishaps come in countless flavors: tremors from distant explosions, putrid fumes from the fissures. Soon enough, one of those fools will tear our city down." - Piltovan philanthropist
name: Unlicensed Innovation

description: Kill a unit.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit.
flavorText: The betrayed invoke Kalista on their dying breath, hoping her spear brings them vengeance.
name: Vengeance

description:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavorText: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker
name: Wiggly Burblefish

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall a unit.
flavorText: Chaos gives claws to the meek. A wolf hounds its prey and is stalled by a felled branch. A hawk dives and tumbles amidst a sudden gale. We are the branch. We are the wind.
name: Windsinger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
flavorText: The rise to power is often a violent business... but it's not normally this freakin' sloppy.
name: Wise Fry

flavorText: While all xer'sai are able tunnelers, only their dunebreakers have the mass and power needed to break through the veins of solid bedrock that snake through the Great Sai, and open up the lands beyond for further hunting.
name: Xer'sai Dunebreaker

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +0|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +0|+1.
flavorText:
"Poppy! Excellent execution of our latest tactic. What do you think of calling it 'Peanut Petalstorm'?"
"I, uh, kinda just hit the baddie with my hammer. Can't we just call this one 'Hammer'?"
"That's what we called the last three!" - Kip and Poppy
name: Yordle Ranger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zephyr Sage</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than Zephyr Sage.
flavorText:
"As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'"
- Saga of the First Lands
name: Zephyr Sage

description: When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jayce</style></link>. <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. For each 6+ cost spell you've cast this game, increase it by 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw Jayce. Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. For each 6+ cost spell you've cast this game, increase it by 1.
flavorText:
"The magnanimous Albus Ferros has once again THRUST himself into the spotlight, dramatically outbidding Clans Cadwalder and Giopara for the rights to sponsor Jayce's Hexgate research. 'A fine day for Ferros is a fine day for Piltover', as the saying goes, and yesterday was a very fine day for Clan Ferros, indeed!"
- Excerpt from a sponsored spread in the Piltover Daily
name: Albus Ferros

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Reduce my cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: Ancient Yeti

description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
flavorText: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.
name: Atrocity

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavorText: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.
name: Basilisk Bloodseeker

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> and <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies one after another.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes the strongest and weakest enemies one after another.
flavorText: "Better duck." - Sivir
name: Boomerang Blade

description: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
descriptionRaw: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean
name: Chronoshift

description: Kill a unit and give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna
name: Dawning Shadow

description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> the enemy then the enemy Nexus.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking the enemy then the enemy Nexus.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
name: Dragon's Rage

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
Nightfall: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
flavorText:
Dragon scale (Eclipse Dragon, Draco Obscuratus)
Notes: Scale has incredible optical properties. Highly reflective under direct sunlight.
Scribbled: IT ALSO GLOWS AT NIGHT!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Eclipse Dragon

description: Give enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round and summon 6 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give enemies Vulnerable this round and summon 6 Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: "My soldiers march on." - Azir
name: Emperor's Divide

description: When I'm summoned, if you've dealt damage to the enemy Nexus 4+ times, grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> 4 times. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've dealt damage to the enemy Nexus 4+ times, grant me Impact 4 times.
flavorText: Chewy outside, tough and gritty center.
name: Furious Faefolk

description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Health.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Frostbite enemies with 3 or less Health.
flavorText: "AaaaaaaAAaaaAaaaaah!" - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: Icy Yeti

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mist</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Summon an Encroaching Mist.
flavorText: Maokai worked tirelessly to cultivate life in the Shadow Isles. The Mist's ambivalence makes its ironies no less cruel.
name: Invasive Hydravine

description:
When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link>. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw Jarvan IV. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies Challenger and Scout this round.
flavorText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc
name: King Jarvan III

description: Deal 1 to all enemies, then do it again.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies, then do it again.
flavorText: "Bring out... 'The Big One'!" - Ziggs
name: Mega Inferno Bomb

description: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of spells you've cast this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of spells you've cast this game.
flavorText: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.
name: Mind Meld

description: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Overgrown Snapvine</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an Overgrown Snapvine.
flavorText:
"Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!"
- Recovered journal
name: Overgrown Snapvine

description: Give all allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give all allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.
name: Pack Mentality

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."
name: Raz Bloodmane

description:
Pick a unit in your hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Reduce its cost to 0.
descriptionRaw:
Pick a unit in your hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
Enlightened: Reduce its cost to 0.
flavorText: "Fully grown trolls have thick hides and dense bones that heal quickly, making them terrible, tenacious foes. Cut them down quickly, lest they recover to fight again another day." - Avarosan Marksman
name: Revitalizing Roar

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 7. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 7. Draw 1.
flavorText: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma
name: Ritual of Renewal

description: When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Shen</style></link>. Allies with <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> have <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a Shen. Allies with Barrier have Double Attack.
flavorText: "Just as we fight to protect the land, the land itself rises up to defend us. We draw strength from the earth's wrath and drive out our enemies. And so, balance remains." - Ionian Priest
name: Sacred Protector

flavorText: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie
name: Savage Reckoner

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
flavorText: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying
name: Scrapshot

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Stasis Statue</style></link> to store all allied units and landmarks that died or were destroyed this round inside.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Stasis Statue to store all allied units and landmarks that died or were destroyed this round inside.
flavorText: Magical energy does not dissipate. It is merely repurposed.
name: Servitude of Desolation

description: When allies attack, spend 1 spell mana to summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Short Tooth</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, spend 1 spell mana to summon an attacking Short Tooth.
flavorText: The Trainer's routine is the same each night. Fish 'n ale for supper, a quick puff of his bubblepipe, followed by kisses on snouts and a story for his sharks before bedtime.
name: Shark Trainer

description:
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and create 2 Treasures in your deck.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 2 and create 2 Treasures in your deck.
flavorText: "These days, there's more treasure 'neath the waves than above 'em, I wager. Would be easy enough pickins, if 'tweren't for her." - Jagged Butcher
name: Shipwreck Hoarder

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
flavorText: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter
name: Smooth Soloist

description: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and "<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Deal 2 to me" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give enemies -2|-0 and "Round End: Deal 2 to me" this round.
flavorText: "Their spirits will burn." - Nasus
name: Spirit Fire

flavorText: "Careful, soldiers! If we tread carefully and don't disturb the nest, we can keep the mother dragon on the defensive. If we rile her up any further... Well, you'll want to be ready to run." - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Stalking Broodmother

flavorText: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General
name: The Empyrean

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
flavorText: "As my time on this place comes to a close, I find myself pondering not my first death, but the second. Who will be the last soul to remember my name? And when they, too, fall to this earth... what will become of me?" - Eminent Benefactor
name: The Etherfiend

description: When I'm summoned, revive the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> dead allied champion.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, revive the strongest dead allied champion.
flavorText: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?
name: The Rekindler

description:
When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link>.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw a Miss Fortune.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.
name: The Syren

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
flavorText: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Kindly Tavernkeeper
name: They Who Endure

description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in hand if you've leveled a champion this game.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in hand if you've leveled a champion this game.
flavorText: The giant scarabs were thought to have perished when the Shuriman empire fell. But the Mist's creeping tendrils burrowed deep into the sands, and bound the ancient things to Viego's service.
name: Thrumming Swarm

description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
flavorText: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal
name: Trueshot Barrage

description: Pick an ally to attack alongside the <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blades</style></link>, then <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia
name: Vanguard's Edge

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
flavorText:
"Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes."
- Saga of the First Lands
name: Windfarer Hatchling

description: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then Frostbite all enemies.
flavorText: Warmother Winter is the first and last foe faced by any who would invade the Freljord. Her bloodsworn are the merciless wind and the biting frost.
name: Winter's Breath

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun 2 enemies.
flavorText: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."
name: Yone, Windchaser

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have 2+ Yetis, summon me from hand and create a copy of me in your deck.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a Yeti.
descriptionRaw:
Round Start: If you have 2+ Yetis, summon me from hand and create a copy of me in your deck.
Play: Draw a Yeti.
flavorText: "...and they're sneaky, too! Last time I was out there, I had found shelter in a cave, only to find yearlings in there, fast asleep. Tried to keep my distance, but then one of the big 'uns returned, tall as a mountain, and covered in ice! Now you listen to me, because..." - Babbling Bjerg
name: Abominable Guardian

description: When I'm summoned, if you've summoned units from 4+ regions this game, grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> 4 times. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've summoned units from 4+ regions this game, grant me Impact 4 times.
flavorText: Squad goals.
name: Bandle Gunners

description: Grant an ally +8|+4.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +8|+4.
flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere
name: Battle Fury

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Play: Capture a unit or landmark.
flavorText: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.
name: Captain Arrika

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Decimates</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Decimates in hand.
flavorText: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.
name: Captain Farron

description: Summon <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copies of the 3 <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> followers you've <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: Summon Ephemeral copies of the 3 strongest followers you've Recalled this game.
flavorText: Memories have fangs.
name: Children of the Forest

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your next <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> this round costs 0 and gains “I deal damage to all enemy targets.”
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your next Darkness this round costs 0 and gains “I deal damage to all enemy targets.”
flavorText:
"Another nightmare?"
"Wasn't all bad. You weren't there."
"Dolt. What was the bad part?"
"You weren't there."
name: Dess & Ada

description: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
flavorText: "Embrace your destiny, and shine more brilliantly than anyone could have ever known." - Taric
name: Destiny's Call

description:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
flavorText: "If a soldier falls, another must take their place. Our banner must never fall." - Garen
name: For The Fallen

description:
Grow all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
descriptionRaw:
Grow all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
flavorText:
"I know I know
You want some more
If you ready let’s go
Giving it all"
- Seraphine, 'MORE'
name: Give It All

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
flavorText: "Listen, Osu. Do you hear that? Bells! Grandfather's back!" - Illi, Star Shepherd
name: Grandfather Rumul

description: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
descriptionRaw: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
flavorText: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle
name: Icequake

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 6. <style=Variable></style>
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 6. 
When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavorText: Within the inner chambers of the Black Rose, Noxian nobles play their pieces, and murder befalls distant victims.
name: Incisive Tactician

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks or deal 3 to ALL other units.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate ALL landmarks or deal 3 to ALL other units.
flavorText: "There was no time to gather our things or warn the others. We could only run for the forest and watch as it leveled our homes." - Avarosan Hearthguard
name: It That Stares

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Each Lurker ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a random enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a jaull-fish to show you who you can trust, and who you can kill." - Pyke
name: Jaull-fish

description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
descriptionRaw: A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.
name: Judgment

description: When I'm summoned or discarded, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Twinblade Revenant</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or discarded, create a Twinblade Revenant in hand.
flavorText: The Demacians crawled to their ramparts to find death itself descending upon their walls. Though they were able to fell some of the Gray Legion, the dark tide of war soon proved unstoppable.
name: Lost Soul

description: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, cast it again on the same targets.
descriptionRaw: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, cast it again on the same targets.
flavorText: "Oh yes, she's quite the mirror master. She makes my designs look even more sublime, and with a small trick of the light, even manages to lend a certain someone a touch of much needed verticality..." - Stilted Robemaker
name: Mirror Mage

description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
descriptionRaw: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
name: Progress Day!

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguards</style></link>, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Dauntless Vanguards, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
flavorText:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code
name: Reinforcements

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill the 2 weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
name: Rhasa the Sunderer

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Cast <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Cannon Barrage</style></link> 6 times on randomly targeted enemies.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Cast Cannon Barrage 6 times on randomly targeted enemies.
flavorText:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"
name: Riptide Rex

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
flavorText: The baccai are tasked with defending the inner sanctum to safeguard the ancient treasures there, and for the sake of mortals that might think themselves clever enough, or mighty enough, to withstand the weight of the Curator's judgment.
name: Sanctum Conservator

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's Ephemeral.
flavorText: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.
name: Spectral Matron

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Legion Marauders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Legion Marauders.
flavorText: Though the soldiers of Noxus rarely leave survivors, the marauders leave even fewer.
name: Strength in Numbers

description: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
descriptionRaw: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
flavorText: "Now, I delivered to you exactly what you wanted, friend. I never said it would last forever." - Tahm Kench
name: Sunk Cost

description:
Sea Monster allies have <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>. 
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Sea Monster allies have Fearsome. 
Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.
name: Terror of the Tides

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. <style=Variable></style>
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. 
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
flavorText: Wherever Ziggs went, Arnie followed, his serene demeanor a natural foil to Ziggs' chaotic zeal. His duties ranged from making sure the munitions were stocked, to putting out fires, to clapping his hands over Ziggs' ears when Ziggs (inevitably) forgot hearing protection.
name: The Arsenal

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Instant Centuries</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Instant Centuries in hand.
flavorText: The constant rumble in the lower levels of the tower are due to The Clock Hand, the tower guardian that steadily winds the gears below.
name: The Clock Hand

description: When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link>. Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a Gangplank. Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
flavorText:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"
name: The Dreadway

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 2 enemies.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> them.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Pick 2 enemies.
Round Start: Stun them.
flavorText: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.
name: The Infinite Mindsplitter

description:
When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus 3 times.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw a Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus 3 times.
flavorText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.
name: The Leviathan

description:
When I'm summoned, Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, Draw a Sejuani.
Plunder: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
flavorText: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard
name: The Tuskraider

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavorText: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”
name: Tianna Crownguard

description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
flavorText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.
name: Unyielding Spirit

flavorText:
They felt it before they heard it, the ground trembling beneath their feet, but it quickly became audible, like distant thunder drawing closer.
Meyrick lifted his head, eyes wide, listening.
"What is it?" Anya whispered urgently, drawing her bow, but Meyrick was already sprinting back toward the path. 
"RUN!"
name: Uzgar the Ancient

description:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 5 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 5 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
flavorText: For generations, Avarosan settlers heard strange, inexplicable sounds within the tumult of winter storms. Eventually, when they ventured much farther north, they finally discovered the source--ancient troll monoliths whispering in long-lost tongues as the wind swept through their yawning maws.
name: Voices of the Old Ones

description: Deal 3 to a unit and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Trifarian Shieldbreaker</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit and summon a Trifarian Shieldbreaker.
flavorText: "Shieldbreaker!" - Sion
name: Weapons of the Lost

description:
When you <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link>, I attack with the <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blades</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
When you Blade Dance, I attack with the Blades.
Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "Gather round, my darlings. Today our feet will glide 'cross the ground that nourished us, with the movements our families taught us. We are children of Ionia, and today we dance for art, for freedom, for each other!"
name: Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Give all allies Barrier this round.
flavorText: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen
name: Brightsteel Formation

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> each enemy to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in place with the enemy stored inside.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate each enemy to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the enemy stored inside.
flavorText: "The cold overcomes all, eventually." - Lissandra
name: Buried in Ice

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Return me to hand.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
Last Breath: Return me to hand.
flavorText: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.
name: Commander Ledros

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
flavorText: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."
name: Corina Veraza

description: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.
name: Kadregrin the Infernal

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall 3 enemies.
flavorText: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand
name: Minah Swiftfoot

description: Revive the 6 <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> allies that died this game and grant them <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Revive the 6 strongest allies that died this game and grant them Ephemeral.
flavorText: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.
name: The Harrowing

description: Kill ALL units.
descriptionRaw: Kill ALL units.
flavorText: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.
name: The Ruination

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
flavorText: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.
name: Arbiter of the Peak

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Increase my Power by the total Power of all allies.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Increase my Power by the total Power of all allies.
flavorText: A nameless aberration towered above them in the smoke-filled chamber. The mages chanted in discordant chorus, dread their voices reaching a strained, fevered pitch. The monster breathed deep of their mounting fear, and each breath brought it terrible power.
name: Atakhan, Bringer of Ruin

description: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them Challenger.
flavorText: "Who else could Demacia send to save her prince than the Lady of Clouds herself?" - King Jarvan III
name: Cithria, Lady of Clouds

description: Your cards have -1 cost, <link=keyword.Augment><sprite name=Augment><style=Keyword>Augment</style></link>, are created by <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Glorious Evolution</style></link>, and are now Tech.
descriptionRaw: Your cards have -1 cost, Augment, are created by Glorious Evolution, and are now Tech.
flavorText: "Progress is everything. I will bring the future to this city, whether it is ready or not." - Viktor
name: Glorious Evolution

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
flavorText: You have twenty seconds to comply.
name: Plaza Guardian

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each ally that died this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each ally that died this game.
flavorText: Once a beast of burden for a kingdom long forgotten, this monster now scavenges across forgotten battlefields, adding scrap to its shell, and the souls of the dead to its core.
name: Scuttlegeist

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
flavorText: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: She Who Wanders

description: Pick an ally. <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> ALL other units and landmarks.
descriptionRaw: Pick an ally. Recall ALL other units and landmarks.
flavorText: "I walk my path alone." - Solitary Monk
name: Singular Will

description: Fill your hand with random cards. They cost 0 and are<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>. You can only play 3 more cards this round.
descriptionRaw: Fill your hand with random cards. They cost 0 and areFleeting. You can only play 3 more cards this round.
flavorText: One mortal's trash is another yordle's giant pile of scrap parts.
name: Treasured Trash

description: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Grow their stats up to 10|10.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Grow their stats up to 10|10.
flavorText:
"We got it all in our hands now
So can you handle what we're all about?"
- Ahri, 'POP/STARS'
name: Feel The Rush

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an ally attacked this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an ally attacked this game.
flavorText: Upon Azir's return, Shurimans caught sight of ancient beasts of legend, made of sand but no less impressive.
name: Sandstone Chimera

description: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH Round Start.
flavorText: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.
name: Warmother's Call

description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
name: The Skies Descend
